review_text: We have always gone long haul with another operator which has always been a great experience. I have heard a lot of good things about Destinology so thought we would give it a shot.Ryan was very responsive to our requests and within 48 hours we had booked our dream holiday in Abu Dhabi. I would certainly recommend Ryan and Destinology to my friends and family!

Maura was amazing, very informative and gave her honest opinion.Nothing was too much trouble, explained things very well.She also confirmed with hotel when I had a query.Amazing wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to book a holiday with Maura again.

Emma Harvard was fabulous! She listened to exactly what I wanted in my ‚Äúdream‚Äù honeymoon and her service made the whole process so much easier and one less thing to worry about when planning a wedding/honeymoon. Couldn‚Äôt recommend her enough. Her alone is 5 stars! Thank you Emma! Will be using her for future holidays!

I wanted a company who could organise a holiday to Iceland for my wife and myself. It had to be individually tailor-made for two independent travellers, with the company doing all the necessary bookings, including all excursions whilst in Iceland. Pete listened very carefully to me detailing our requirements, discussing them at length to make sure he had an exact clear picture of what we wanted. Within 24 hours he had come up with a fully-costed package including a very attractive 4 star hotel, flights and a programme of activities and excursions which met all our needs, and more besides. The price was very competitive. We were so impressed we have asked Destinology to come up with a holiday to Sicily for next year.

The customer service we received from Isaac was second to none. His professional manner and attitude to making sure we got the holiday we wanted at a great price was refreshing. Having never used them before we are really impressed. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to book a holiday. Thanks Isaac.
Leesa provided us with numerous quotes and allowed us to find the perfect holiday. As always, Leesa took care of everything and the whole process was easy. Thanks again for the wonderful service

review_title: Maura was fantastic when helping me‚Ä¶
review_text: Maura was fantastic when helping me arrange a special family holiday. She really went above and beyond, looking at all the various options that best fitted our requirements within our budget.
Our consultant Claire Shorrock, was excellent. Destinology took care of everything including recommendations of Hotels for our trip to Thailand. Easy to recommend.

Communication was effective. I had received a follow up email from Emma Kingsley after last years quote which was not successful. She got Anthony Pearce onto this years holiday quotation. We had a few back and forth communications which were prompt and helpful.
What impressed me the most was the efficiency of the travel consultant and the speed in which I was able to organise a holiday with her.

review_title: Would like to say a big thankyou to‚Ä¶
review_text: Would like to say a big thankyou to Emma who booked my holiday to Dubai for me next week .. although I booked late notice and there were certain issues with hotels etc Emma went above and beyond to make sure I got the best deal possible and nothing was too much trouble .. I couldn‚Äôt praise her enough and would definetly recommend booking with this company ..

review_title: I would recommend and use Destinology again and again üëç
review_text: We have used Destinology before when we went to Thailand and it was amazing, this made it really easy to decide to use them again.

Joanna was exceptionally knowledgeable and friendly helping me book my family trip to Thailand, despite my constantly changing requests! As usual the staff at Destinology go one step further than their competitors and I would have no hesitation in recommending Joanna and the wider Destinology company to others who seek exceptional customer service when booking their annual holiday.

Leesa was brilliant! Incredibly attentive with quick response times and didn't mind pulling about 10+ quotes for us to ensure we got our wedding trip right! Booking with Leesa through destinology has been the smoothest experience we have ever had when using a travel agent. She's been great to answer all our queries and is happy to liaise with the hotel and airline to do so. Cannot recommend her enough!

review_title: Lee did an excellent job finding us an‚Ä¶
review_text: Lee did an excellent job finding us an alternative route to Muscat rather then EK and their poor flight times, but more importantly the huge price rise they have introduced so Business class flights were more than the hotel. Anyway would recommend you and use again. We travel a lot so have a lot of experience.

Faisal was very knowledgeable and patient, coming up with numerous options to fit our requirements, whilst being realistic for our wish to travel to a very popular destination at busy time of year, and with short lead in.  The booking process was painless, and now look forward to our holiday!

review_title: We use Destinology to book all our‚Ä¶family holidays
review_text: We use Destinology to book all our holidays. They provide an excellent service and always take the time to understand what we are looking for and give us a range of options to choose from. Faisal Khan has helped us with the last few years holidays and his communication and attention to detail are exceptional. He will always go above and beyond to make sure the holiday we book is the right choice for us.

Craig at Destinology has booked my last three holidays, he is so knowledgable, replies to any query however small very quickly and I appreciate his help greatly. I will continue using this fantastic service for many years to come, thank you
Very prompt responses from Jo Britton. She has been amazing and it‚Äôs has been lovely booking with her!

review_title: A big shout out to Craig Robinson who‚Ä¶
review_text: A big shout out to Craig Robinson who has provided fantastic service and support with our family booking to Mauritius. From the word go, Craig has been so friendly and professional.  He always responds immediately to any questions that I have and has been so helpful in organising with the hotel our advance dinner bookings and special birthday celebrations.  I have been extremely impressed by Craig‚Äôs local knowledge of the resorts and hotels in Mauritius and feel really confident that I have made the right decision to book with Destinology.  I will certainly be recommending their services to all.  Many thanks Craig.

Gemma was wonderful and helped us find our perfect honeymoon to Mauritius. The attention to detail was notable and no request too much. A bespoke, professional and friendly approach to customer service. This company came highly recommended to me and I would also highly recommend, so much more effective than trawling the internet and only exceptionally good quality holiday packages.

All the arranging was taken over by Georgia we just told her what we wanted and she delivered an excellent package‚Ä¶‚Ä¶all the hassle taken out of planning. Brilliant hotel and location for an amazing price x

Gemma Larder at Destinology made our booking to Dubai effortless and went way and beyond in finding the right hotel and flights, she even reserved our plane seats and arranged transport from our home, fantastic service!Thank you Gemma

review_title: Wanted to say thank you to Emma
review_text: Wanted to say thank you to Emma, O'Reilly who was very helpful with our booking, she was patient to answer any questions (lots) I had, and followed up with emails to make sure everything is aligned. to be honest, I didn't know much about destinology, but after speaking to Emma, I was comfortable proceeding with the booking. Sarmilan

review_title: Jo  was very pleasant and helpful in‚Ä¶
review_text: Jo  was very pleasant and helpful in sorting our holiday requests.

I cannot thank Joanne Cottee enough for all her patience and assistance, it was a pleasure to speak to her. I‚Äôve been using Destinology for approximately 10 years. They have been consistently excellent, a rarity these days. They are one of the few companies that know the true meaning of customer service.

review_title: Holiday to Dubai. Spoke to Ryan who listened to the type‚Ä¶
review_text: Spoke to Ryan who listened to the type of holiday we wanted to book. He took the time to explore a number of hotel options for our family suggesting hotels he had actually visited and had a wealth of knowledge on their suitability for families. Ryan quickly sent us package quotes along with useful hotel information. He was professional, polite and efficient. This is our second time booking with Destinology. We will certainly be booking with them again next year.

Claire is really approachable, professional and friendly. Her communication is always fast and she never keeps us hanging around. She takes the time to understand what we need and want from a holiday and that‚Äôs why we always come back to her. She‚Äôs the best.

review_title: From a dream into a reality
review_text: The communication from all staff has been amazing, from calls to emails, I have found them to be polite, professional and extremely helpful in finding the right holiday that accommodates all my requirements. My advisor Christine Power has been amazing, I give her a few ideas and she turns them into reality - my go to travel advisor. All very experienced, knowledgeable and wonderful people as well

review_title: thinking outside the box and coming up with a great deal
review_text: I phoned Destinology and spoke to Ryan Duggan to see where we could go for a bit of winter sun. I wanted adults only and somewhere I hadn't been in the past. Ryan was very helpful in suggested Doha and came up with a very good price for a fantastic 5* hotel. I liked that Ryan had looked beyond the typical destinations and suggested something different. I can recommend Destinology and applaude their good service.

We booked a "5* hotel" through Destinology, which turned out to be at most 3.5*.  On our return I sent a lengthy email to Destinology and asked when they last visited the property.  While they have taken my complaint seriously and have offered me ¬£200 off a future booking, they have not replied on the date of their last visit. I simply do not trust their knowledge of the hotels they are selling, and I think that it is important that travel agents have excellent property knowledge - that is what we are paying for.

My parents have used Destinology to book our family holidays in the past so they were first in mind when we were looking to book our honeymoon. Craig made the process so easy and seamless from start to finish. We were also able to get everything booked via email so we didn‚Äôt need to spend any time going into travel agents or speaking on the phone which worked really well for us. Craig was great at getting answers to questions we had about our chosen hotel & surrounding area too.Thank you for the amazing service, will definitely use again for future holidays.
Jo at Destinology is a true professional. She is my first call when booking luxury holidays and goes above and beyond to ensure that the resorts are perfect for my family,
Submitted my request with details.  Antony come back promptly, as usual,  with appropriate suggestion. Clarified a couple of points . Booked .Stress free - the way we like it !

Following our enquiry, Ryan Creeney called me within 15 mins and we agreed for him to call back the next day which he did at the exact time. His knowledge and help was superb and really helped make the choices and also saved us money. I would certainly recommend Destinology and Ryan to friends, family and colleagues.Well Done!

review_title: I was disappointed with their service‚Ä¶
review_text: I was disappointed with their service on two occasions. I tried to get a price last year for a trip and they took several days to respond and I had to chase them several times. The price then doubled. I tried again this year and but again they tried to increase the price of the flights by 60% in 24 hours. They then booked us into a double room and after questioning the type of room we were told it was a cliff-facing room which previous guest views advised against as these rooms have no view and little light.  They advertise them as the expert in luxury travel!!
I used to book all my holidays through Southall travel for the last four holidays. I‚Äôve booked with this wonderful lady, such a beautiful service right from the start.

review_title: They clearly don‚Äôt want my money!
review_text: I contacted Destinology three times to enquire about holidays, they said they would send over suggestions and nothing came. When I followed up they said they would check what had happened and send over ideas for holidays and of course, nothing came! I had previously used them and spent 10k on a holiday so you‚Äôd think they‚Äôd want my business but apparently not! Disappointing.

review_title: Great service - thank you Emma O‚ÄôReilly
review_text: I booked with Emma O‚ÄôReilly. She was super helpful in helping me to find the best options and deals to Mykynos, so much so I went back to her days later to book our annual family holiday with her too. Highly recommend Destinology and booking with Emma!

Chelsea was really friendly and helpful. She found us a perfect holiday meeting all of our requirements for a great price. She was really approachable and answered all of our questions quickly. Will definitely be going to Chelsea at Destinology to arrange our holidays in the future!

Faisal was fantastic.  Really helpful and came up with a great option for a family holiday.  Super quick response to our initial enquiry and holiday was booked within 24 hours. This is the second time I have used Destinology and they do not disappoint.

Great personal service, quick to respond and clear comms all the way through. Had some really good options that met my needs and was very happy with the choices and the price, which was better than I could have achieved. Was also just a load of time spent as it‚Äôs always a hassle with a big family.

Always get such a friendly and efficient service and Joanne Robinson has helped us for many years and has become like an old friend!  She knows exactly what we like or dislike and she's never let us down.

review_title: Very happy with the booking process of‚Ä¶

Gemma I can‚Äôt thank you enough, my wife‚Äôs special birthday is going to be one to remember thanks to your fabulousness! (Gemma‚Äôs extension is 3048)

Emma O‚ÄôReilly, was really helpful. review_title: Once you find a good company you stick with them
review_text: Once you find a good company for whatever you need in life, you stick with them, and I have stuck with Destinology for over 12 years and trust them with our yearly getaways to the Indian ocean. They have a great team and I have never had any issues with Destinology as a company.  Everything is always handled swiftly and professionally.  I will undoubtedly keep returning.
Lady who dealt with our booking was first class

Second time to use Destinology - first time was a great holiday in Dubai. Really helpful advice, eg stay on x side of the island in August to avoid the strong winds on the other side which would mean you wear a coat in the evenings. And: you don‚Äôt need the family suite for a family of 4, get two superior rooms, we will link them and you get privacy and it‚Äôs cheaper!Etc etc lots of similar examples and patient responses.A pleasure to deal with.

review_title: Christine Lawford is as always the‚Ä¶

Being easily able to contact the same travel expert to arrange my trips is very important even though his/her colleagues are equally competent. Talking to the someone who knows one‚Äôs particular likes and dislikes makes life so much easier.

The agents are very fast and efficient , they make sure they have heard all your requirements and provide the best option according to the requirements. I wish i can plan my holiday again this year with Destinology as everything is arranged from A to Z and i don't have to worry about anything.

We‚Äôve been using Destinology for years and they never disappoint. We have recently booked a holiday to Thailand with Louise Clough who was absolutely brilliant from start to finish. Excellent service from Gemma. Very friendly and knowledgeable. Didn‚Äôt feel pressured to book right away which isn‚Äôt always the case with other companies. All booked now and really happy with the price. Will most definitely book with Gemma again.

review_title: Amazing service provided by Gemma Lardar

review_title: Thank you Emma Harvard for your help.

review_title: Very helpful and booked the holiday we wanted
review_text: Very helpful and booked the holiday we wanted very efficiently. Georgia was very efficient and the personal service, makes any after questions very quick.

review_title: last minute trip to Dubai for my wife's Xmas present
review_text: So I decided to treat my wife to a 5 day January break to "somewhere hot" for her Xmas present.  I found Destinology on the internet and as soon as I registered my interest I had a call from Ryan within the hour.  To say his knowledge and professionalism is probably the best I ever experienced is a slight understatement.  After finding out what my "wish list" was, we agreed that Dubai would be the best bet, he then came in with an unbelievable deal on the Palm and all inclusive too, so nothing else to worry about.I will be using Ryan again undoubtedly for my next trip/s as it really was very easy from start to finish and I have a happy wife, which is the best thing of all.
Christopher Ford was very knowledgeable about the flight and destination; and patient when we changed our mind.Recommended and we will use again.
Destinology was very professional and made choosing our holiday a quick and easy process.  The lady who helped us was patient , professional and really listened to what we requested.

review_title: Wow! What a service. The streamlining of all aspects of the‚Ä¶
review_text: The streamlining of all aspects of the service from booking online, agent Amelia who was amazing and helpful, the start to finish, choice of hotel was better than imagined and the support and help of Hotelwas beyond belief. Connections was the best. So pleased to be whisked off from airport to my Hotel bed in under an hour. Never been so happy with a choice of Holiday.  service was really professional and drivers were particularly helpful. Will be back with you sooner than later.

If unable to answer Anna always phoned us back as promised. Truly an excellent company to deal with, which going forward, has given my wife and I complete confidence in our holiday and all our wishes fulfilled. Thank you.

review_title: Emma O'Reilly went above and beyond as‚Ä¶
review_text: Emma O'Reilly went above and beyond as the original hotel we wanted was closed - very clear called back when agreed and took all the hassle away - 5th time I have used destinology and will keep coming back

review_text: We had such a fantastic Wedding Celebration at Fairmont the Maldives. Joshua Parry was very kind and helpful with us organising our holiday according with our budget. It was our first time using Destinology and for sure we will be use it again.

We have used Louise at Destinology for our last few trips and we could not recommend her enough! She organises everything including the best flights, best hotels and transfers. The excellent service even continues when we‚Äôre away where we get help with booking spa experiences, restaurants and excursions. Destinology will continue to be our go to travel provider!

Emma has been available to answer all my queries. She promptly booked our holiday and made sure that we are provided with all the required information.

review_title: What a great experience booking our‚Ä¶
review_text: What a great experience booking our last minute Break with Emma O‚ÄôReilly.  So professional and very informative we will 100% be booking again thank you Emma for all your help .

After my father passing away at the end of October, my mother and I decided that we would like to go away for Christmas. Due to the short notice we understood that finding somewhere suitable would be very difficult. We spoke to Felicity who worked tirelessly over 48 hours even working on her day off to find us the perfect holiday. She is an absolute superstar and was extremely kind in our time of grief

Another brilliant experience from Destinology! I contacted our usual agent, Amy Williams, regarding a cruise we were interested in taking in 2024. Amy passed me onto her colleague, Emma O'Reilly, as this is her department.Emma was as helpful and as lovely as Amy. She contacted me promptly, went through all of the options and gave a very competitive price. I wanted to double check our children were happy with the destination so she said she would call me for following morning.As promised, Emma called on time, reiterated the cruise details and the deposit was made. Throughout Emma was lovely - a great mix of friendliness and professionalism and she was knowledgable about the ports of call on our chosen cruise too.We wouldn't look to book our holidays through any other company now and I've lost count of how many holidays we've booked through Destinology over the past 6 years! If there's ever an issue (as there was on our holiday in Dubai last August), they are on it, sorting things out and it feels as if nothing is too much trouble.5 stars, 10 out of 10, top marks all round!!
Speed, composure and accuracy when dealing with our enquiry.
Faultless service from the team.  Emma H made my booking look easy, everything taken care of.  I felt very reassured that any changes would not be a problem.
The return call came promptly, and within a short conversation Anna understood what I was looking for. We conclude our holiday plan with satisfaction. I hope it will turn out to be what is promised.

Excellent t√©l√©phone manners, friendly and efficient service. Hannah Gray listened to what I was looking for and responded with a range of relevant options, including some I may not have thought about. Excellent communication, concise, prompt and actually very fast. It made me feel valued, and that she really cared that I should have a great holiday. I would trust and book again with Destinology.

She recommended various hotels and talked through the pros and cons with us and helped us work out what was best for us. She took the time to talk with me and to really understand what would work for our family and helped us narrow down what could have been a daunting list! But where Jo really made a huge difference was in helping me put together an amazing itinerary - she spent time talking with me about the best places to go, the best times to go (Summit OV at night time - thank you Jo, amazing!), how best to organise them around our other plans and also helped me book tickets for some of the sights and even for a Broadway show. She was genuinely interested in making sure we had an amazing time in New York as a whole, not just in where we stayed, and she really went out of her way to help put this all together. Big thanks to Jo - and we‚Äôre in touch again with her now plan getting her help in planning our next family trip! No hesitation in going back direct to Jo! üòÄ

review_title: Emma O‚ÄôReilly and Jo - Dream team
review_text: Emma O‚ÄôReilly was soooo thorough, it made my wife and I feel so at ease. She made us feel that she cared about our holiday even more than we did! She listened intently to our very detailed criteria then proceeded to serve us up an awesome deal with a room upgrade we weren't expecting, a better food option and ¬£500 cheaper than our budget! When we then took a U turn and decided to up our budget and quoted another stay we'd found with another travel agent, she then swiftly not only offered a price lower then the other agent, but added an extra nights stay! Totally blowing the other quote out of the water, and doing it in hours not days. She outclassed the other travel agents we had asked to look and very quickly it became clear that Emma was 'the chosen one' in all aspects. Better holiday choices at better prices, more efficient, more thorough and nothing was too much trouble. We felt very looked after and she exceeded our expectations as to what a travel advisor would provide. In the future we'll stop shopping around for hours and just pick up the phone to Emma instead! On the day of booking she was off and said a colleague of hers would be there if we needed to book it. No sooner had my wife and I decided to go ahead we got a courtesy call from Joanna Kaye saying she was the appointed person taking our account in Emma's brief one day absence and if we should need anything at all she was there. That proactive approach was very impressive. Jo was friendly, helpful, professional and had a great sense of humour, you could sense destinology is filled with 'A players' and fair play to the management for their staff selection and onboarding process, it clearly works and the staff are very proud working for the company. Great win for Destinology team üëè

review_title: Destinology listened to our requirements and found a solution
review_text: I am reviewing the consultancy and booking service here because we haven't travelled yet. We needed bespoke arrangements for a holiday in the Caribbean and then onward travel to the USA for a family wedding before returning home. The usual operators (BA, Virgin, TUI etc.) were all hopeless. I tried Destinology as we used them a few years ago for a holiday in Mauritius. They listened carefully to our needs and then went away to prepare proposals. We liked one but needed small modifications which they applied without fuss. I am impressed with the way Destinology consultants listen to what the customer wants and then try to find a solution, rather than just giving up (which is what the others all did). Bravo Destinology. We'll see what happens when we travel but I have a lot of confidence at this point.

review_title: We've been booking with Craig at‚Ä¶
review_text: We've been booking with Craig at Destinology for many, many years and we've just booked with him again for Easter 2023. We've built up a great relationship where he really understands what our family want from a holiday and then delivers, year after year. When you have kids and have to holiday during school holidays, breaks become a big investment with huge potential risks in getting it 'wrong'. We've found that expert advice and guidance means we're never disappointed and always have a seamless experience. Even in the midst of the Covid days, Craig went out of his way to be on the phone and help us through moving several holidays, when some other travel agents were ignoring their clients on email, let alone phone. I'd not trust anyone else with our larger holiday plans and we used to be a family who always planned their own breaks thinking we knew best. The knowledge, experience and customer service delivered by Craig and team is faultless and ensures the best holidays possible. Can't thank them enough for the years of awesome holidays and experience.

She successfully obtained suites next to each other, and got us the flights. She negotiated some useful discounts with the hotel. Although she had already dealt with my son, she readily engaged with and advised me, so we could quickly conclude the deal.

review_title: Leighann Morgan looks after us really‚Ä¶
review_text: Leighann Morgan looks after us really well. Feels like one of the family!

I recommend Destinology regularly now to family and friends if looking for that luxury trip with a personalised touch.

review_title: Simply the best booking experience from Claire
review_text: This was our first time booking through Destinology. After looking at multiple deals and getting multiple quotes for our Maldives holiday we gave Destinology a go. I must say that Claire was excellent. She really understood what we wanted and provided that personal touch which made it soo much more of a pleasant experience. There was no pressure selling and she offered us advice and ensured us they will be available throughout our holiday anytime we needed.

I can‚Äôt thank Craig Robinson enough for organising our holidays. I like dealing with one person who knows what we want and can tailor it all just for us. He is quick with his responses and deals with all our queries efficiently. I will definitely continue to book through him/Destinology.

Superb advice and responsiveness from Sean McQuillan, Travel Consultant at Destinology. With limited half-term availability coinciding with an essential business trip for our family business, Sean tracked down flights and accommodation that fully met our requirements when our original choices proved unavailable.

review_title: Excellent service from start of enquiry‚Ä¶

My husband and I booked Maldives earlier this year and travelled last month to celebrate our wedding anniversary. From the moment of enquiring to the booking process it was a pleasure liaising with him. Sam understood our requirements, listened so attentively and ensured we have a wonderful wedding anniversary. I had great conversations with Sam and at times i was anxious about travelling again since the pandemic hit but Sam was so patient and understanding and put my mind at rest. He delivered a very personalised service. A big thank you to Sam for making our experience a wonderful one! Also thank you to Kirsty Elliot who dealt with our situation so well when Heathrow decided to delay our flight which also meant we missed our connecting flight from Doha and were stuck in the airport for hours. Kirsty dealt with it right away and made the necessary arrangements to inform the resort and keep us reassured! I highly recommend Destinology for the great service and will definitely book again for our next trip!

review_text: Amelia was the most wonderful agent, nothing was too much and her communication was exemplary. I have and will continue to recommend her personally to friends and family.

review_title: My consultant was Elania who was‚Ä¶
review_text: My consultant was Elania who was fantastic. I had a challenging request, with short timescales and, with some creativity, she came up trumps. She listened exactly to want I wanted and presented a great option. I will definitely be using Destinology again. Carol R

Just to say I haven‚Äôt even been on my holiday yet but after many years of Covid cancellations destinology have been absolutely fantastic, most recently I have been helped by Keith who has helped us pull all the stops out to make our honeymoon in Mauritius one to remember! Thank you so much Keith :)

I have used Destinology for years and have always had a good experience. Sadly, in this instance I feel the pressure to make a sale took over and the resort we ended up in is well below the standard we are used to. As I was in a rush to book something at the last minute I relied on Destinology, asking them to look at the 8+ holidays booked with them, to recommend a resort in Greece. I am now in such recommended hotel and to be honest, I‚Äôd rather be home.I agree with the response from Destinology.  After I called to voice my disappointment, Lauren was extremely helpful and responsive and she arranged to promptly move us to a different resort.   The first resort recommended was recommended within an hour or so of my call and even though it was late in the day Lauren was very apologetic that she may not be able to move us that night. I didn‚Äôt  expect that  anyway but it was very reassuring that our experience was taken seriously. I had the chance to think about the recommended resort overnight but I wasn‚Äôt entirely sure about it. When I spoke to Lauren the next morning she had already been working on a second back up option which is what we ended up with and promptly moved that day. The second resort was outstanding and  we ended up having a fabulous family holiday. I also really appreciated that Lauren gave us the heads up that she was handing over our file to a colleague while she was away for an afternoon and after our move, checked in with us to make sure all was well. Lastly, I also believe Destinology upgraded our airport transfer on our way back to a very luxurious private van which was a lovely gesture. Overall, a very personal, thoughtful and knowledgeable handling of a difficult situation so a five star rating for that.  Well done, Destinology!

review_title: What is the point of them?
review_text: One of the return flights for our dream family holiday was recently cancelled. We were told the only replacement flight was another six hours later meaning we now have to spend the night sleeping in the departure lounge in Dubai airport with our two young children. This is not acceptable. On their website Destinology claim that they "offer a dedicated concierge experience to match the luxury quality of our holidays" and that "from the moment you call, to your return home, your dedicated concierge is on hand to assist you with anything you need".In reality, we've spent over a week sending repeated emails to their customer service team to see whether they can provide us with accommodation for the night or any kind of compensation, and every single one has been ignored. God help us if we actually encounter an issue on holiday that requires immediate assistance.So I really can't see the point of this company at all. You'd be better off booking direct as going through them doesn't seem to add any value and if anything makes getting any issue resolved even more frustrating.Very disappointed.Edit: Despite the reply from the company below, after 2 weeks waiting for a response they weren't any help at all, apart from suggesting we stay at our own expense in the airport hotel overnight. The review stands.

We have worked with Craig Robinson at Destinology for 7 years or so now and he is beyond excellent. We have Centurion Amex support and we still use Craig for all our holidays as he is so knowledgeable. He understands exactly what we like and don't like and goes way beyond in getting the right trip organised for us.
Leanne is incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. Thanks so much again for helping us book. You're a star!!!

We have been to Maldives many, many times and again Leanne was there to assist and provide additional guidance to assist with our booking and some new adventures. review_title: First class service from the start
review_text: Found these guys through Google and couldn't be better pleased with the service thus far. Sam Cooper, who took my initial call, has already arranged my first trip and been super responsive to changes I've had to make, been proactive in changing itinerary due to upcoming strikes - it's really been a service-driven approach and very much appreciated. I will use Sam for pretty much all my trips now and would highly recommend Destinology. Worth noting that when Sam was off for a few days, his team seamlessly picked up communication for me in his absence. Great service guys.

Incredible holiday ! I have just returned from a fantastic holiday in The Maldives. Everything was as described, in fact even better!  Destinology took care of everything perfectly from arranging our seats on the aircraft, making sure my daughter had veggie meals to pre-booking the restaurants for our stay. This was a special once in  a lifetime trip for us, thank you for making it perfect.

review_title: From the first time speaking to Sam at‚Ä¶
review_text: From the first time speaking to Sam at destinilogy my holiday booking experience has been a breeze. Nothing is to much trouble for Sam, he listens, recommends and organises everything no matter how small or tricky my requests have been! I won‚Äôt book via any other agent in future , that‚Äôs how much of a difference his personal touch has made!

Wow , I‚Äôve just had the most amazing holiday in the Maldives . Destinology was incredible from the start , the service was second to none , nothing was left the chance with everything catered for in advance . We had the pleasure of staying on two resorts . The first Niyama which was impeccable  , just like paradise in the pictures . All the staff couldn‚Äôt do enough to help and make our stay unforgettable. The food was beautiful in all the speciality restaurants on the island, I won‚Äôt ever forget the underwater restaurant we visited, we were able to sea so much sea life  . We got  around the island on personalised bikes which were waiting outside our beach pool villa . Just perfect . Our second island Varu was also wonderful with a different feeling about it . The all inclusive package was a real treat , again the food was wonderful, and the staff were so attentive . We stayed in a water bungalow this time rather than a beach villa and the contrast was a nice change , giving us a taste of two different aspects of the Maldives . This island offers fabulous water sports activities , some of which are included in your stay . We had lots of fun here . Cocktails with a complete relaxed atmosphere. Another thing which was sorted without a hitch where the transfers , the seaplane along with the speedboat ran completely smoothly there and back with so many of the hotel staff there to help us . We honestly could not get enough of this wonderful place and it beautiful people and I can‚Äôt wait to go back . Thank you Destinology x
Beth at Destinology was amazing. She made the process of booking our holiday so easy and stress free. Five star service!

A very good experience with Amelia - she was great!  She made the whole process smooth and seamless.  The other thing that was great, was that she listened, so she knew what our budget was and stuck to that too.Thank you for everything!

review_title: Not happy... ALL THEY WANT IS YOUR MONEY
review_text: i booked my 10 year anniversary holiday to the maldives, I explained to the agent my requirements over the phone and he gave me options i explained i was unable to take one of the resorts as it did not have a water villa pool and that was one of my MAIN requirements, i mean how can you go to the maldives and get a water villa without the pool it just does not make any sense. when we arrived we were not informed about the extra transfer which took us another 4 hours added to our travel time and when we arrived to our resort we were super excited and when we entered our room we found out we did not have a pool in our villa this was my gift to my husband for our 10 year anniversary. extreamly annoyed and shattered i burst out in tears and was assured by the resort manager they could see what they could do i emailed Bruce who was my travel agent and he did not respond i emailed the destinology help desk and they said they will look into the matter but that took 2 days to do so and they said there was no mention of a water pool villa i informed them i have never been to the maldives and assumed all water villas come with a pool as the picture which was showed to me had a pool. every day i emailed them and we were only there for 4 nights in the end we managed to get an upgrade for 1 night which we had to pay extra for. when we returned i was called by the destinology team for reviews i explained my whole situation to her and from what i felt she left the conversation she will take this further and she told me she will get someone to call me its now been 4 months i emailed destinology and they still have not replied back to me and no further calls were made to me. we wanted this to be a very special trip but i would definately recommend that you do your own research for the resort you have chosen and they do hide some details from you to make the sale.i read all the other reviews and i agree after paying in full for my holiday I had to call them up as i had not received any of my hotel accomodation or flight tickets they informed me every time i called that Bruce is not well and he will contact me a day before i was leaving after getting angry is when i received my tickets and hotel vouchers. i booked Destinology for my honeymoon and we were so happy and we agreed that we will book with them again for our 10 year anniversary. but i think they are declining in customer service i had to fork our an additional ¬£350.00 for an upgrade and lost a day oin travelling as we had to wait at male airport for 4 hours before taki9ng another 1 hour domestic flight which we only found out when we arrived at male airport so we lost a day absolutely horrible service.

He managed to find us something exactly on budget and I'm really happy with his recommendation - I've found loads of good reviews on the place we're due to go to, so I feel pretty content that the rest is over to us!

Are you wanting to book a luxury trip of a lifetime? Or perhaps even a honeymoon? Or just a getaway with a nice element of luxury? Confused about what to do and where to stay? Have no worries destinology will ensure you go absolutely nowhere. I‚Äôve had two different agents try to arrange my trip to South Africa, 1 who to be quite fair did respond but failed to take on board anything  that I said. Often placing hotels and routes not on my plans and sending a trip several times over the budget specified. Secondly, then stopped replying to emails perhaps maybe cause she couldn‚Äôt accept that someone would want something different to what was planned? I begrudgingly accepted defeat and I thought I‚Äôd try again this time by phoning my enquiry through. Surely the phone service will be better? Again a pleasant woman answered and took down some details and told me to expect a response back by the latest after 48 hours. She gave me an extension to reach her personally and I anxiously awaited a response. 48 hours passed and nothing... so I waited another 48 hours. I called several times a day and no answer. It‚Äôs a good job I used someone who actually cared otherwise I‚Äôd probably be sat at home right now rather than going on holiday. Despite using destinology in the past and having zero issues I‚Äôm actually disappointed with how downhill the company has gotten. Quite frankly I wouldn‚Äôt trust them with a trip to Blackpool let alone anywhere exotic.

After two years of utter chaos with insecure holiday bookings, zero support from flight companies and hoteliers (and several lost holidays), we booked our first post-Covid big family trip with the lovely Leighann Morgan. We're off to Barbados!She has taken the stress and worry out of the whole process and I don't think we want to book another important, special trip without her help.We feel so confident that we're in safe hands - travel nowadays seems fraught with process and doubt, but Leighann has really helped us start to get excited about travel again. She even sent both me and my partner, and our parents (whose combined 70th birthday we are celebrating in Barbados) a lovely gift of wine from Fortnum & Mason - my mum didn't know what to say, she was delighted. It's like travel was at a bygone age - special, unique and tailored.Unlike booking with hotels.com or booking.com, you get real, caring service from real people who care about your holiday plans and who will take the hassle out of travel nowadays. Plus, the rates are even better. Leighann has also booked a VIP transfer as the airport at Barbados can be tricky and take time to get through. Thank you for all your help x

We have used Leighann (Morgan) for many years and she never fails to exceed our expectations. This time we were really struggling to get away due to only being part vaccinated and she went above and beyond to find us something that worked. Which it did, as we ended up having the most amazing honeymoon in the end thanks to Leighann. review_title: Very professional trustworthy Company, I have booked three holidays through with them, Maldives, Florida Mauritius
review_text: Booked three holidays Florida, Maldives, and Mauritius  with Destinology. The advice and support has been tremendous. Leesa sorted out Florida and Maldives and Craig Mauritius. The Maldives went on the UK.Gov Red  list for COVID and I received a full refund within days, I therefore have full trust in this Company. We are a family of 5 and travel from two countries when we meet up and therefore present different challenges when booking a holiday. Have to say Craig pulled out all the stops and gave us 7 options to look at. Brilliant job and really happy with the package we choose. In addition to the professional advice you also get the personal knowledge from this team. Thanks to one and all. Looking forward to booking another fantastic holiday with you in the near future. Thanks! All the best Paul

review_title: We have booked via Craig at Destinology‚Ä¶
review_text: We have booked via Craig at Destinology for years and would not use anyone else.  We like 5* luxury holidays and have high standards - Craig works hard to find the right destination that suits our family.  Every holiday we‚Äôve been on he checks in with us when we are there and is always on hand to help organise anything we need.  The latest holiday to the Maldives was a minefield with PCR tests and sea planes etc and a Destinology rep was at Male airport to walk us through the whole process.  Couldn‚Äôt  have been more grateful.  You get what you pay for with Destinology- that‚Äôs great service and stunning holiday destinations.
As always the service, prices and advice was excellent. We have used Amy at Destinology a number of times to help us book holidays and it‚Äôs always a fabulous service - would definitely recommend.

review_title: A very pleasant holiday booking experience.

review_title: Bitterly disappointed with the standard of service.
review_text: Having used Destinology several times in the past, I had no hesitation in asking them to help book our second trip abroad since 2019. The initial booking was fine but the after service up to the day of travel was shockingly poor. A total lack of communication and after care meant a very stressful pre travel period for our family. Destinology fell very short in terms of service standards and I‚Äôll never use them again.

Sophie was excellent. Listened to what we wanted, came up with suggestions, patiently priced several alternatives and was polite, friendly and professional throughout. Thank you

We received a poor service. After booking we were just left on our own to figure out testing requirements, what excursions to book, what airport lounge to use. The transfers were far from luxury and there were no beds supplied for our young children on arrival at 2am! All this was additional stress you can do without for a ‚Äòluxury‚Äô holiday. There was a complete lack of interest after booking. This was not a bespoke luxury holiday service. I won‚Äôt be using again.

SO impressed with Destinology and my Agent, Amy.  She was streets ahead of all the other agents I approached.  I was a late booking so Amy didn't raise my hopes but came back really quickly, and on a Sunday, with a couple of great alternatives and job done!  Thanks Amy! :)

Destinology were amazing to look for the perfect holiday for our Honeymoon. They picked out the perfect tour and hotels that fir our budget. They looked after us every step of the way explaining what could be changed. There was no pressure from them to book immediately. Mark Hathaway was our agent and he went above and beyond to help us got us the best deal. I would definitely recommend using Destinology for any holiday enquiries. 5 Star in my books
IGNORE TEXT

Antony was great, I gave him specifics we wanted for on trip in Dubai. Within a matter of hours he had provided me with some great options but made recommendations on his personal opinion on what would work best for my family. Immediately asked him to look for my Christmas holiday due to his service

Amy was great at making our booking and taking our money but that was where the good customer service ENDED. There were red flags such as getting our names and DOB wrong on the booking which we asked her to correct. A few weeks before our holiday we asked for advice on Covid testing she kept sending us web links through to complicated govt websites - we just wanted her to tell us what was needed. This was not possible.We then went to look at our ETIHAD flight bookings and noticed she had spelt our sons name wrong on the flight details. This had to be changed.When we arrived at our hotel we were booked for 6 days not 7. We then had to query this to get it sorted. Even though we escalated our concerns to destinology they just didn‚Äôt seem bothered in actually helping us - beyond a fruit bowl and house wine being put in our room by way of an apology. It appears to me that they do no checks on the booking which ultimately caused stress for us. Their website says  ‚ÄòWith Destinology you receive your own personal travel consultant, who will ensure that no detail is overlooked - however small - right from your initial enquiry, all the way through to you returning home.‚Äô This was clearly not the case and we would have been better making the booking directly ourselves.We will never use destinology again

I work in sales. I try to get customers to set clear objectives. I am on holiday arranged with Destinology in a couple of weeks and have just booked for early next year. In both cases i set objectives and in both cases, Keith from Destinology came up with what I wanted, even made suggestions as to how the trips could be improved, his advice has been gratefully taken and we have two holidays to look forward to. The service we receive from Keith is nothing short of excellent. I thank him. Hope he gets to see this.
Beth hasn‚Äôt been great from start to finish. Very detailed, lots of options and has taken the time to meet my families needs. Thank you

review_title: Great when selling, very bad when amending/cancelling your trip
review_text: have been a Destinology member for several years, booked various holidays to Maldives, Seychelles etc. never had a problem.Now when I needed to cancel a trip because of health issues they did not even bother to help me, all they said is "sorry, we cannot change or do anything for you", that's not 5 start customer service for long term members. So I lost all the money from the trip, thanks to Axa travel insurance I could claim some back.Even after not booking with them anymore they do not seem to be bothered.Great to sell you 5 star trips, very bad if it comes you need them to make changes or cancelations.very disappointed

review_text: We had first class service from our personal travel concierge Craig Robinson and when he went of holiday the ball was quickly and efficiently picked up by Antony Pearce. So there is the challenge for next time Destinology how about "a seamless experience" achieve that and there is the 5th star but nevertheless a great shopping experience
Destinology consistently provides excellent customer service. Leesa in particular is always helpful, thoughtful and informative, which makes you feel a truly valued customer üòÅ

So Destinology is one of those rare occurrences where you think ‚Äúyes, this is how it should be‚Äù. The agent who dealt with us, Leesa truly did offer a first class service and really made us feel that she was there looking after what we wanted from a break rather than just trying to sell a holiday. Imagine where you ask somebody what the hotel was like and they had been there, or if she hadn‚Äôt she could find one of her colleagues that had. We‚Äôve still yet to go on the holiday but so far we‚Äôve had nothing short of a first class service and would highly recommend!

review_title: Destinology..... Let's see how they fix this mess
review_text: After specifically asking for a beach resort in Malta and spending close to ¬£3000 for the trip itinerary looked like it met the requirements I also requested a sea view the hotel ended up being in the middle of town I have a brick wall for a view no rooms are sea view and the beach is out the hotel down the street and then onto an joining part allocated for the hotel I also asked for an adult hotel this to was out of key putting me in a family hotel in the middle of downtown not the best area either.I  also asked for a room close to the lift I have a 200 meter walk which only aggravates things further since I suffer pain a lot .It's my second day of a 7 day trip I complained on getting to the hotel I have not even had a reply as to anything they would do for me.This is not the trip I wanted or asked for and for the money could have gone almost anywhere for a 7/day trip being my first in two years and also being a past client of destinology I would say start to look at other luxury agents as this is far away from the service I used to get.If I booked the flight myself and hotel it would have cost me only 1400 instead of 2750I question the value of destinology and the service and quality provided At least for the moment.The staff and food here are ok but what I paid for was not this By far.I am now trying just to get a better room but would never have booked this trip to begin with and destinology should at least have the courtesy to try sort out something anything as promised.The new room I sorted out was no better.Don't trust the itinerary look up the hotels on offer yourself.I trusted the premium rate we all pay destinology to take the headache out of things and have a professional arrange my trip which is what we pay for.I won't do it again at the moment let's see what Destinology does for me after this awfully booking have given them the opportunity to fix this lets see what happens will update...I have now had contact with Destinology and have a 28 day wait for review I except  a refund or credit to spend and go on the trip I should have and only stayed for 3 nights in total I returned to uk buying another ticket myself  as the hotel was that bad,,,,I did have call back only for me being told there was not a better option available so booked a new flight and returned to uk.    "Do Not book Intercontinental Malta".....under any circumstances understaffed rooms have sticky floors , lifts broken, no room service , restaurants advertised as 6 one was closed the rest opened sporadicly no dedicated room service even till 11pm as was said to me making it a 4 star by default, staff themselves at the hotel agreed with everything I said to them and the hotel is also facing a construction site with constant noise , the sky bar was shut out whole time , room fridge was empty it might as well been a serviced apartment by no way a 5 star Hotel.They cut corners everywhere I did not even have my room turned down once in my stay the hotel is due a refurbishment am told...Staff were polite and tried to help but they are overworked as the shortage of staff was really bad they all were running from one job to another.Bottom line am waiting to see shat happens with Destinology , will they fix this mess or not..Will let you know how they sort out this kind of mess...Is just as important and am giving them the opportunity to fix this mistake of a trip I was sent on." Don't Book intercontinental "New update November 5th,,,,Destinology has now refunded me what I spent as a credit to use to book another trip, it should be noted that while I had an awful trip Destinology has testified it in the best possible way and is as important how companies fix the bad experiences you may have with them it has given me the confidence to book with them again and am happy so far by the results if my complaint .

Very helpful and knowledgeable.Highly recommendedMany thanks
The most difficult part is handing over the money, everything else about booking a holiday with Destinology is perfect! Keith, thank you once again.
The customer experience so far has been amazing!
Huge thanks to Anthony Pearce who has yet again sorted out an amazing holiday for us. He is so professional to deal with and his knowledge about the destination is unquestionable. Thank you!
Always a great service, competitive prices and friendly travel agents.
So helpful! Amy Darbyshire simply rocks.....best travel agent I have ever worked with!

review_title: I can always speak to a very helpful‚Ä¶
review_text: I can always speak to a very helpful person after only a few rings. Super customer service as always. Have booked through Destinology a few times now.
Any Williams - superb service again!

review_title: Thank you thank you thank you!
review_text: I just wanted to say a huge thank you to Leesa and Pete for the fantastic service & help they gave us when booking our recent holiday.  My dog became seriously unwell a week before we were due to go away and I knew I couldn't leave him so between Leesa and Pete they managed to rearrange our whole holiday at minimal cost when we should have incurred huge losses.  Nothing was too much trouble and they honestly went over and above even sending e-mails at 11pm trying to sort for us.  I am more grateful than ever, especially as we have been unable to travel for so long!  Thank you once again Leesa & Pete and we look forward to recommending you to our friends and re booking with you again soon.  Best regards Amy

review_title: All advisors spoken to have been very‚Ä¶
review_text: All advisors spoken to have been very helpful and polite, easy to get hold of them by phone and emails quick to respond to any questions.
Leanne was fantastic, always available and nothing was too much trouble.
Leesa is always super happy, helpful and really knows her stuff.  She goes over & above and is a great asset to Destinology.
Great service. Friendly staff. Always a good selection of lovely destinations / resorts.

review_title: I always love booking with Destinology
review_text: I always love booking with Destinology, Faisal always looks after us so well, I love the extra level of service, the personal touch, and the ongoing service even once booked, it takes away all the stress and time of checking in, seat booking etc....Destinology go above and beyond to give a premium service, why would I book a holiday with anyone else?!

review_title: Amazing service and great covid refund policy
review_text: Leesa from Destinology was absolutely fantastic helping us arrange our holidays in very tough travel environment. She was very friendly, professional and super helpful. The destinology covid refund policy is great and the information they provide is clear. They are not the the cheapest optionsout there, but the service and peace of mind they provide is excellent.
Great guy Adam ParkerVery flexible and very helpful

Excellent customer service experience with Beth Higson. She was informative, friendly, softly spoken, kind and efficient. She is an asset to Destinology!  The quotation paperwork was equally efficient, easy to follow and visually methodical. Great job Beth! Best, Jo Ferraro

review_title: Smooth and simple transaction by Keith
review_text: IGNORE TEXT
Fantastic, as always. Makes your holiday feel exciting from the enquiry stage.

Hannah was knowledgeable about the resort, painting images to supplement the website and providing clear and helpful answers to all my questions. The booking process was efficient. Generally, a delightful experience. Thank you Hannah.

Leanne was absolutely exceptional!  Friendly, personable & understand our needs for the holiday precisely!  Very, very knowledgeable on various destinations we discussed.  Cannot rate the service highly enough.

Destinology were amazing in helping us to book our Honeymoon. We were torn between two resorts and the provided great advice. Nothing was too much trouble, especially when I change the dates/flights several times.

review_title: Great service from Amy as always in‚Ä¶
review_text: Great service from Amy as always in sorting our holiday.Even out of office hours is extremely efficient at replying and looking at requests.Would 100% recommend Amy and the company as a whole for a 5 star, reliable and professional company.

I recently booked a trip to Las Vegas with Destinology.  I entered my details online and within minutes of submitting it, Leesa contacted me.  Leesa was extremely helpful, friendly and professional. She did a lot of research into various flights to cater for our needs.  I have booked with Destinology previously and would definitely use them again.
Very helpful friendly approachable staff

review_title: Keith is a credit to the company and‚Ä¶
review_text: Keith is a credit to the company and the best travel rep I've dealt with.
Great service as always, Craig always answers any queries or deals with any requests even outwith his working hours. Highly recommend & will always use Destinology for our travels abroad
Excellent, speedy and professional service.

review_title: First experience is a good one
review_text: First time using Destinology, and it has been a pleasant experience What else can I say, good personal service.
VERY HELPFUL AND PATIENT , ARRANGED LAST MINUTE BOOKING FOR US WITH NO FUSS

Always excellent service from Destinology. Booked with them many times now and wouldn't go anywhere else, especially after the help we recently received from Mark in rearranging our trip due to Covid for what felt like the 100th time. One of the most efficient and helpful companies I've dealt with, and Chris this time was no exception.

Ryan was helpful throughout and tried hard to secure the changes that I had requested with the hotel in Dubai, along with obtaining a better deal than was available on the website. Clearly I was, and still am, concerned regarding the Covid issue of UAE being on the UK government's 'Red list'. However, given the cancellation policy arrangement that Destinology have in place this has provided me with a good level of reassurance.

review_title: I booked a cruise with Sheila Ferguson‚Ä¶
review_text: I booked a cruise with Sheila Ferguson who couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful. Making a few changes was never a problem. I‚Äôll definitely use Destinology for future travel on land and sea.

review_title: Keith Mitchel was great he worked his‚Ä¶
review_text: Keith Mitchel was great he worked his magic and save me a lot ofMoney on hotel covid tests ..    I never thought I‚Äôd use a travel company but cost and service was better then doing it myself

review_text: Great experience with our travel rep‚Ä¶. Used her multiple times now, she knew exactly what we were after and the whole experience pretty painless.
