review_title: Very impressed with the product and the company!
review_text: Very impressed with the product and the customer service.  I follow a very low carb diet, so was looking for a more 'grown up' alternative to alcohol, but not one with lots of sugar added. This is lovely. So far I've only tried it with slimline tonic and a slice of lemon, but the booklet enclosed offers lots of ideas. Presentation was also excellent. Thank you for a fantastic delivery service to me in the Western Isles too!
I bought this as a gift so I haven‚Äôt tasted it but the service was great and it arrived so quickly, my friend has reported it tastes good, and is looking forward to trying the cocktails.

review_title: If you want a gin like 0% alcohol then‚Ä¶
review_text: If you want a gin like 0% alcohol then this is good. Although a bit too intense on the botanicals  for me. Think I will stick to proper Gin.
Great service. Good packaging; label, bottle size.The liquid has an intense nose. Refreshing, botanical and herb flavour. I  Love it over ice.
Very clean, modern hotel- prices a bit too much for what is offered but overall, great spot.
Beautiful bottle and lovely story/branding but the flovour isn't quite right for me. Some of the cocktails look good though so might try mixing it up a bit.

Good service, sent really quickly and well packaged. I guess the taste is down to personal preference. I liked it, it was kind of medicinal, sasparilla-ish (which I like) but there was something odd I couldn't put my finger on. Then my 11yr old son walked past and said, 'what smells of vinegar?' - and that was it. Despite that, it was quite nice. Better with a tonic than on the rocks - it just felt a bit thin for on the rocks.
Excellent service and the product arrived on schedule, as planned. I haven‚Äôt had the opportunity to try it but look forward to doing that very soon. Lots of good ideas on recipes to try.Thank you

review_title: This is the best non-alcoholic beverage‚Ä¶
review_text: This is the best non-alcoholic beverage we‚Äôve tried.  And we‚Äôve tried quite a few.  Definitely recommend. Delivery was received amazingly quick and customer service was excellent when I had an address error that needed correcting.  Great experience overall.
Not to my taste, but I appreciate that others might like the flavour.However, great customer service and reputable company.

review_title: Great service and a lovely ‚Äògrown up‚Äô‚Ä¶
review_text: Great service and a lovely ‚Äògrown up‚Äô alcohol free drink. Loved the recipe booklet that came with it. Full of inspirational ideas!

review_title: A customer for two years and planning to make it three!
review_text: I‚Äôve been drinking Feragaia for over two years now and obviously love it. My favourite cocktail is my take on a whisky sour! I also love their new chamomile planter containers, which makes me wonder if a chamomile/Feragaia cocktail could be a good idea? I‚Äôve never had a problem with shipping, customer service or quality. Definitely a happy customer here and I can‚Äôt recommend it enough! Give it a go!
Favourite non alcoholic drink, no feeling there's something missing! Great balance of flavour and intrigue.

Firstly delivery was spot on.More importantly the taste of Feragia is quite unique and very satisfying. I have tried many of the Botanical alternatives to Gin that are on the market and this is the best, Only complaint is the bottle at 50cl is too small and it is a bit on the pricy side.
Great non alcoholic drink, delightfully package in recycled material. Have only tried it with tonic at the moment.

review_title: The concept sounded good so thought we‚Ä¶
review_text: The concept sounded good so thought we would try it and not disappointed. A great taste and great customer service
Tastes/smells like Underberg, just awful

review_text: Sorry but it was not to my taste, I am not a spirit drinker and although it was alcohol free it was too similar for my taste.  For your info it tastes very similar to Peppermint Hemp Essence.

Very nice, complex flavours keep the pallet guessing...

review_title: This is my 3rd time buying Feragaia
review_text: This is my 3rd time buying Feragaia. At first I thought it was ‚Äúunique‚Äù to say the least, if not unpleasant tasting. After trying it again I have accustomed to its unique flavour and appreciate it more. It‚Äôs fun to experiment with while it does take a few drinks to get used to it.
Really lovely taste, been having it cold with ginger ale and hot by warming ginger beer as per the booklet that came with it. Fast delivery and well packaged, will be a permanent winter drink for me.

What a real surprise.... these guys are doing a great job! As a fellow Scotsman and 'Fifer' its not often I am impressed in this drinks space but Feragaia are doing a sensational job. MOST importantly the liquid is insanely good! - I mean seriously good! This coupled with their wonderful packaging, story/messaging and authenticity is just really impressive. Dont hesitate and we are onto our second bottle!

Loved this! Tastes great with tonic water- with nice smokey undertones.A good alternative to a Gin and tonicMy only complaint is the price. Could do with being a bit cheaper...I'd probably buy it again if it was about 10quid cheaper
Haven‚Äôt tasted it yet - keeping it for valentine‚Äôs day!  But purchase and delivery very smooth and efficient.

review_title: Earthy flavours from an earth conscious brand
review_text: Quick delivery and great customer service. The earthy and salty notes are a welcome change from overly sweet beverages. Great to see another Scottish brand focused on sustainability too. Looking forward to trying more recipes and spreading the word.

Really speedy delivery - I've been enjoying a Feragaia with tonic (and an orange garnish!) every night since it arrived! Love the bold and authentic flavours - it's already a firm favourite. Look forward to following the Feragaia journey.

review_title: I have just received my first ever bottle of non alcoholic Feragaia ‚Ä¶
review_text: I have just received my first ever bottle of Feragaia. Having completed dry January I am now contemplating giving up alcohol for good. At the age of 52 this is not a decision I have taken lightly as I love my Scotch, Bourbon, Ale and Cider. Having cracked open my bottle of Feragaia and poured a measure into my tumbler my first impressions are good. Smells very aromatic and tastes earthy. The after taste reminds me of Angostura bitters. Early days to tell if I'm going to be a convert but first impressions are positive!
Although this product is not for me I cannot fault the management team who are quick to offer me a solution
Love this - very different from anything else I have tried.  My favourite is with plain tonic.

review_title: Ideal gift for someone who‚Äôs medication‚Ä¶
review_text: Ideal gift for someone who‚Äôs medication doesn‚Äôt allow alcohol and enjoys a wee dram before bed.  Thank you

review_title: The best non alcoholic drink on the market
review_text: The best non alcoholic drink we've tried. It's not trying to imitate any other spirit - like so many others do (and fail) - it has its own unique flavour and experience.  We order regularly and enjoy every sip. Recommed most highly.
Very happy with the service from Feragaia - my order arrived when stated, beautifully packaged and looks wonderful! Thanks very much :)

Service excellent.Presentation top notch.Tried a suggested cocktail, from the enclosed booklet, and found the taste  different to anything l‚Äôd tried before but refreshing and enjoyable.Definitely worth trying.

review_title: the delivery was on time I am really‚Ä¶
review_text: the delivery was on time I am really enjoying Feragaia its refreshingly different
Very unique taste, botanical and reminiscent of pine. It's warming too. Much better than run of the mill gin impersonators. Bravo!

It's nice to have nonalcoholic drink that isn't trying to 'be' alcohol.  Mixed with tonic water or ginger ale this has a very moreish taste and is very refreshing. Although it doesn't try to be alcohol the fact that this is a distilled drinks means there is a very satisfying aftertaste.

review_title: Good service although not really for me...
review_text: Product was received very swiftly and was well packaged. Unfortunately, I wasn't that keen on the taste of the drink itself - a little too 'earthy' for me, but it was a great service in terms of presentation and receipt of the goods.Updated review:Thanks for the suggestion of trying it in different ways - I have tried it with a few different mixers (tonic water, ginger beer, lemonade and even coke) but haven't managed to acquire the taste just yet... Excellent, great product and a good substitute for whiskey if you're going alcohol free.
it is different, i like sweet drinks, so is not sweet enough for me.

I did not rush to review Feragaia as I needed to understand exactly what I was drinking and how to gain the most from it.Firstly let me say that if you treat Feragaia like a cordial just because its non alcoholic then your making a massive mistake.Feragaia needs the respect you would give a quality Whisky or Brandy, it needs to be taken slowly so its complexity can be enjoyed while you try and figure out just what's going on with your taste buds. (which let me tell you I still haven't )Using mixers with Feragaia is where it really comes alive, the changes are remarkably and the possibilities endless. While some drinks only succeed with certain mixers Feragaia flavours allow a wide range to be experimented with and I still haven't narrowed it down to a favourite.I will continue to purchase Feragaia alongside my selected Whisky and Brandy and would recommend anyone who enjoys good quality spirits to do the same.

What a great tasting drink! I really wasn‚Äôt sure if I would like this but I really am enjoying it. It‚Äôs a unique flavour but really warming! Perfect for these cooler evenings. Thank you for getting this to me so efficiently and promptly plus the personal service. 5 stars!
Love this! A great treat when you don‚Äôt want to drink alcohol.

Beautifully presented and swiftly dispatched, but I was a little disappointed to find the chamomile flavour rather dominating.  I love the idea, and hope one day to find something really special - and wild! - but chamomile takes me back into the garden....   Please keep trying!
The product tastes dreadful. Sorry but that is the truth, I was so looking forward to it, but it tastes like a serious bitter medicine. A very expensive mistake.

review_title: I was expecting something nearer to‚Ä¶

review_text: The item is beautifully packaged and presented but cannot say that I would order again. Am yet to try with ginger ale but with tonic or soda it did nothing for me. It didn‚Äôt give me any sort of enjoyment or pleasure at all. And while I may not have had an alcoholic drink for 11 years ( once an alcoholic always an alcoholic the thirst never leaves you ) I am yet to find any alternative ‚Äúspirit‚Äù that creates any of the enjoyment I associated with spirits. Non alcoholic beer seems to be able to make the jump but for me spirits have a very long way to go.

review_title: Enjoyed Really enjoyed this drink with ice and‚Ä¶
review_text: Really enjoyed this drink with ice and ginger ale. Can happily recommend.
Fantastic quick turnaround from ordering to delivery, a great trustworthy company and website, this was our second purchase of Feragaia..
Great customer service. Item arrived promptly & presented in a lovely box with recipe book enclosed.
Great product, have only drunk it once so still to try suggested mixes, which was a nice touch to add. Well packed and quick delivery

Not my thing, It tastes horrible, like a gone off herbal vinegar. I tipped it down the sink, didn't even cook with it. I agree, it could possibly be described as 'complex' but in a bad way, as though the creator has tried too hard and lost taste bud clarity. Sorry, but I don't know how you can sell this stuff
Great service, delivery and packaging.The product itself is so good, a measure with ginger ale is great! Bought it for husband‚Äôs birthday and we‚Äôll definitely be buying again

review_title: A delicious and really unusual brew of‚Ä¶
review_text: A delicious and really unusual brew of natural flavours - a proper drink without alcohol but with all the pleasure and taste to savour the unique blend of ingredients.  The only problem is limiting yourself to a wee dram!
I love the idea of this, but for me personally the taste is not quite right. Try it for yourself though.

Firstly: the product is excellent. You can taste the care that has gone into making the spirit. It's a really complex taste which I won't even pretend to try and explain but it is delicious!Secondly: payment was easy and delivery was very quick - couple of days and free shipping. The company (Jamie) is also very friendly.Overall, would definitely purchase again. A must-have in a well stocked bar. I look forward to trying some of the cocktail suggestions.

review_title: Great product getting me through dry‚Ä¶
review_text: Great product getting me through dry Jan lockdown! Delicious and now convinced about non alcoholic cocktails.
Excellent service. Came very quickly. Very well packed. Really liked the idea of  recyclable tube.

review_title: I have recently started drinking non‚Ä¶
review_text: I have recently started drinking non alcoholic spirits and was introduced to feragaia by a friend, and it‚Äôs absolutely delicious. Now my go to for a night when I don‚Äôt feel like drinking, and even when I do! 10/10 would recommend.

review_title: Delicious on its own or in a cocktail!
review_text: I love making (and drinking!) cocktails and have never really got on with non alcoholic spirits but Feragaia has really converted me. It‚Äôs genuinely delicious just with ice and works beautifully in a mocktail or even an extra layer to a cocktail. I love it!

review_title: I have always been sceptical of non‚Ä¶
review_text: I have always been sceptical of non alcoholic spirits, however this really does mirror having your favourite cocktail after a hard days work. It is everything I enjoy in a drink AND leaves you feeling fresh and ready for the world the next day.
This is delicious!!  Feragaia has a distinctive and delicious taste and is head and shoulders above other alcohol free spirits that I've tried before.  It's sourcing story is pretty impressive too!

review_title: A proper grown up drink that is a great‚Ä¶
review_text: A proper grown up drink that is a great alternative for someone wanting to cut down on alcohol or abstaining completely. No sugar either, which is very refreshing as alot of other drinks are too sweet. Great taste on its own and can mix it up to create different cocktails . Top marks!
Finally, a non alcoholic drink that tastes great, has the body of a great spirit and has been well produced. Mix it with ginger ale and you'll never turn back!Great, quick delivery too!
Continuing to enjoy this excellent product, buying the six bottle package each time.  Delivery was very prompt.
Love the product, came with a booklet of recommended serves which we loved. Quick delivery too!
Great delivery of the product. The product has a unique taste similar to a whisky but can also be used where a gin would be used!

I'm an ex alcoholic. I'm not looking for an alcohol replacement or a "mimic." I see so many reviews from people on numerous non-alcoholic spirits basically disappointed because they've not managed to emulate a spirit, minus the alcohol content. Honestly, those people are fools. A non-alcoholic spirit should be exactly what Feregaia have created.... a premuim and thoughtful alternative for those that wish to own a drink that they can enjoy socially, or alone, and appreciate it's thoughtful crafting. The price point also makes me feel like i'm buying a premuim drink, not an overpriced gimic, which some are. I think it adds value to the produce but keeps it affordable or "worth it"I sat down to enjoy my first drink last night and poured myself a nice brandy sized portion, on the rocks, and i honestly LOVE it. It's what i've been looking for. It has a rich and noticabole flavour and the warmth isn't an attempt at reproducing alcohol, although it's not a million miles away, it's just an epic finisher to let you know you're drinking something with character. It will be most definitely my "spirit of choice" It's the only one that's clearly distilled but still manages to retain amazing flavour where most are watery and bland. Honestly, sometimes they are like sweetened water although i can appreciate the process and the thought. Others are very different again and are their own, often fruity or peppery botanical concoctions and some are really lovely. However, the feeling of enjoying a balanced and thoughtful spirit, with none of the alcohol but all of it's own charm and flavour, is something i've not yet been able to find and is the thing that made me enjoy spirits in the past. Alcohol content was always the burden.Feregaia's founder contacted me personally after purchase and not only the product, but the customer service, are second to none. They have found themselves a very happy customer

review_title: I‚Äôve changed my review to two stars
review_text: I‚Äôve changed my review to two stars. I tried it with ginger ale as suggested by Jamie and it did taste better. Still didn‚Äôt love it. I‚Äôll try a couple of the cocktail recipes and see how that goes.
Fantastic all round! So easy to order, beautiful packaging (love the cocktail book) and more importantly it is delicious, and even better guilt free! Love mixing with ginger ale.
Fast service. Really like this stuff - not just as a substitute, but as a drink in its own right.

The delivery was speedy, the packaging and design lovely but the product was not to my taste at all. The marketing is excellent but doesn't quite communicate what this product is (how it tastes, what the sensation of that taste is). I bought it expecting something aligned with whiskey because of the way Scotland is a prominent part of the marketing and because of how the bottles look. Don't buy it if that's what you're looking for. It's its own thing and I hope the company finds a way of communicating the qualities of that. Their customer service is excellent and they are clearly passionate about what they're doing. I wish them well and hope they make something for someone like me in future.
Love the drink! Tastes delicious with soda and lime or with tonic.
Not what I was expecting. Not to my taste.

review_title: I‚Äôm afraid that I did not like‚Ä¶
review_text: Easy to order, Personally I‚Äôm afraid that I did not like Feragaia on its own.  I liked it better mixed with Ginger Ale.  I like sweeter drinks. Good to know there are people making new drinks with and without alcohol.

review_title: A far more complex taste than any other‚Ä¶
review_text: A far more complex taste than any other non alcoholic option currently in the market.
As always excellent product, delivered quickly and no fuss.

review_title: At last - the BEST non-alcoholic spirit!!!
review_text: At last!!!! A non-alcoholic spirit which actually tastes fantastic! I'd tried all the other obvious ones, Seedlip etc... but Feragaia tops them all! Give it a few goes and experiment with the cocktail booklet - I've tried with blackberries and ginger ale - delicious; fever tree clementine and cinnamon - lush; and just ginger ale - just bought some mint to try some of the others. The first bottle only lasted 2 weeks - virtually no calories too. I dress it up in my gin balloon glass and crave it by the end of the day - but next morning a clear head following a sound sleep. Just ordered 2 more bottles and had a good chat with Jamie when checking how soon they would arrive. Well done - a versatile really good quality drink. It must have taken some passion and commitment to get right. Thank you!

A top-quality, beautifully presented product with a very sophisticated taste. I am a gin and tonic drinker and have tried this with Indian tonic (good) and Mediterranean tonic (superb). I will be buying again as a way of enjoying an evening drink experience without the alcohol. Well done guys!
Stunning product. Deep flavours. 5*
Yes lovely product,I‚Äôm actually just sipping on one right now really nice

Second bottle, bigger one this time and being more experimental with the recipes. As both Husband and I enjoy a good whisky when drinking alcohol this definitely hits the mark when having a break from the booze.Tastes great on the rocks or as a longer drink with all the recipes.
A completely unique flavour, it doesn‚Äôt taste like an alcoholic drink at all and has a very strong flavour. I bought it as a gift for my husband and he loves it. I‚Äôll be purchasing again.
IGNORE TEXT

review_title: I dislike courgettes and I love ginger
review_text: I dislike courgettes and I love ginger, those are my tastes and I can‚Äôt change them. Courgettes are a perfectly decent vegetable, it looks appealing, it‚Äôs nutritious, it keeps well not the fridge but just not to my taste, that‚Äôs not the courgettes fault so I‚Äôd rate it as a vegetable as 5/5.Feragaia is not to my taste, although I did like it better than courgettes. I could appreciate that it had layers of flavour, could see its potential perhaps for cocktails where it‚Äôs not the primary flavour, it had a nice colour and a unique smell which all goes into the event that is a post hard day treat. So I think it still deserves a solid 5/5!Delivery was quick, the welcome bonus available via the website was appreciated, arrived in a nice box, email receipt confirm and tracking info helpful especially given I‚Äôm in a Royal Mail parcel black hole at the moment.

review_title: Great product and it arrived in record‚Ä¶
review_text: Great product and it arrived in record time.

review_title: Feragaia has a real depth and‚Ä¶
review_text: Feragaia has a real depth and complexity to it, I have so far tried it with ginger ale and lots of ice and it is absolutely delicious, you do not lose the Feragaia in the mixer, it shines through.  I am looking forward to trying some of the other suggestions in the beautifully presented little book that came with it.  I highly recommend it!
Great depth of flavour.  My favourite is with spiced orange ginger ale, a curl of orange and a bay leaf over ice.
Fantastic customer service and the drink was happily received by the recipient. I tried the drink and was very surprised at its complex flavour and would recommend!
Absolutely delicious and so versatile!! We‚Äôve only just received our bottle a few days ago and have already made up a load of different cocktails. A great tipple!

review_title: The most delicious drink delivered on‚Ä¶
review_text: The most delicious drink delivered on time and as requested.  The way it comes with a lovely leaflet full of ideas of what to mix it with and the way the follow up emails have also suggested ideas shows what a great product and set of people who run it.  I shall be back to order again

review_title: Delivery was good and the whiskey ü•É is‚Ä¶
review_text: Delivery was good and the whiskey ü•É is lovely

review_title: Facebook offers all seem to have‚Ä¶
review_text: Facebook offers all seem to have issues. I was told of ¬£10 offers and yet I had to write about it on facebook to sort it. Which it swiftly was. But I shouldn't have had to, so that's the reason for the 4*. Packaging delightful and easily recyclable.
Great taste. Not sweet, so you could be drinking a really good gin.Certainly a product I am glad to have tried.Lovely package too.
My partner loves this drink, we make mocktails with it and it gives it a really nice depth.
A lovely drink! Different from anything I have tried before and particularly nice with tonic. It has got me through dry January, nice and dry, so far.
Excellent purchasing and delivery service , and well presented product. However, the product was disappointing and not to our taste but I‚Äôm sure will have many followers .
I really like this, its just like having a long drink. Abit like gin but with a lovely taste. Hard to describe. Definitely will buy more. Thank-you

review_title: I bought a bottle of Feragaia from the‚Ä¶
review_text: I bought a bottle of Feragaia from the Feragaia website and I was constantly updated via email on when it would be delivered, which was really helpful.  When the bottle was delivered it arrived with a really smart little book full of cocktail recipe ideas.  I made one and within half an hour was making another because the first was so delicious.  It is also very good on its own just with ice.  I will definitely be buying another bottle.  My only suggestion to the team would be please can they make some larger bottles as I think I will get through this one very quickly.
Great Service, good delivery, and they kept in touch about availability - all good

A total game changer . Delicious on the rocks.

I met Jamie at a wedding a year ago and he told me about Feragaia. I finally got round to ordering a bottle and made 5 of the cocktails for a fun lockdown night in with my family. I made the spiced pear sour, Paloma, wild mojito, winter wanderer and thirst quencher. It was a massive hit. We each liked different ones. I really enjoyed the Paloma. The botanicals come through gently. We'll be ordering another bottle. Great work Jamie.

review_title: Very good service but sadly we did not‚Ä¶
review_text: Very good service but sadly we did not like the product.

A good, professional personal service especially in light of the delays with the postal service during COVID - 19. The product itself is delightful, fresh and thousands of flavors which interact with ones taste buds at different moments throughout the tasting experience. For those who do not imbibe in alcohol this is a delightful and exciting product to entertain your guests taste buds with. I congratulate the team on their alchemy expertise.

review_title: This is a delicious drink with an adult‚Ä¶
review_text: This is a delicious drink with an adult flavour. Distinctive and flavourful. Ideal for a regular tipple and perfect, also, for dry January. I look forward to drinks time every evening!Well packaged and delivery time was  very good, not excellent compared to a competitor. I say this just to to induce a bit more incentive. I was happy with the order process from start until arrival.Recommended.

Very impressed with Feragaia, it‚Äôs got the bite and bitterness I was looking for with the opportunity to add sweetness with mixers rather than being overly sweet in itself. Feels like an event to fix a drink with Feragaia. It‚Äôs to become a staple Captains Hour tipple on our sailboat adventures.

The Feragaia arrived perfectly packed and tasted delicious! The perfect non-alcoholic alternative. Tastes complex, special and different and doesn‚Äôt get boring as a lot of sweet drinks do. Highly recommended.

I was keen to try this non alcoholic drink, it has been well marketed. Nice presentation. I tried it this evening, it has a fairly distinctive flavour, maybe some sea weed/iodine. I had it with tonic, not sure that‚Äôs the best mixer , I‚Äôll try ginger ale with the next glass.
Great drink, tastes good, goes well with different mixers or on the rocks, super pleased!
Great alternative for a treat during dry January. Would definitely carry on with this alcohol free drink after dryjan is over! Mixed with tonic and ginger ale.

It's great to support a new small business with this very interesting spirit.  I'd say it's an acquired taste, and something that will be fun to keep trying with various different mixers - but first impressions have been doubtful.  The cocktail recipe book that comes with the bottle gives all sorts of ideas for varying the drink though, so we shall keep going.  Oh to be able to try this out with friends - when out of lockdown!  Good luck to the team at Feragaia - we need more interesting home grown things to taste - even better when it's not bad for us!

review_title: Feragaia is not trying to be anything else but itself! Superior to any other Alcohol alternative spirit.
review_text: The Feragaia bottle arrived very quickly and safely packaged. It is a very different taste and it took me a couple of evenings to truly appreciate it but I now love it. I personally have it with ginger ale which I prefer to simple tonic water but both can be done. I would certainly recommend it as it has a certain punchiness that many other "alcohol alternative" drinks lack. It's not trying to be anything but itself which in my view will be its secret to success. Well done Feragaia and good luck!!

review_title: i have tried other alcohol free drinks‚Ä¶
review_text: i have tried other alcohol free drinks but they are all too sweet and have no oomph! Feragaia has a lovely depth and aroma to it. It arrived in some really cleverly designed packaging that added to experience. A fan. xx

Really tasty, citrusy, herby non alcoholic spirit that‚Äôs hitting the spot at the end of the day during my dry(ish) January. I just have it on ice with some orange peel, but it‚Äôs nice with soda or ginger ale as a long drink.

review_title: Delicious and great service and story
review_text: Delicious and great service and story. I shall be ordering again.
Excellent service and quick delivery. Still working out the perfect mixer but it's very interesting on its own over ice. A nice addition to my alcohol-free collection!
If you don't drink alcohol, try Feragaia.  If you do drink alcohol, still try Feragaia.  That's the beauty of it.  It's super refreshing with a stand out taste - a satisfying 'grown up' drink.

The level of communication from the people at Feragaia is superb. I had initially received the wrong sized bottle and this was very quickly rectified. Nothing was an issue. I like this product, it tastes lovely with a variety of tonics (my favourite being the spiced orange Fever Tree) and it is refreshing. I shall definitely be buying more.

review_title: Great to be able to have a smaller‚Ä¶
review_text: Great to be able to have a smaller bottle to try this for the first time. Beautifully presented and great to have all the information.Looking forward to trying the many varied ways of trying this drink, so far tried Thirst Quencher and Paloma.Many different levels,sharp at the beginning  through to a warming finish.
Really lovely company to deal with, super customer service and I really admire the quality of the advertising, packaging etc. they've really put a lot of thought in to it!

I have been pleasantly surprised by Feragaia.The taste is exceptional as is the aftertaste.I think ginger ale brings out the best in Feragaia but that may be a personal preference. Certainly recommended.

Great fast delivery. Lovely packaging & inspiring reciepes. This drink is something different. Great with ginger ale. It gives you the whisky feel as a mixer and also pure without anything ( as I usually drink my whisky). Now as I am a huge fan of single malt. The nose and taste is a bit confusing. My partner loves the taste ( he likes scotch & bourbon ) it but seems to be allergic to it I wonder which ingredients that could be as it seems to be all natural.

review_title: Fresh, sophisticated and distinctive new drink
review_text: Loved the fresh, sophisticated and distinctive taste, perfect with tonic. Ordering was simple, delivery fast and I would definitely recommend this for those seeking a grown up non-alcoholic drink

Had never tried a non-alcoholic drink before, and this really surpassed my expectations. The satisfying complexity of flavour meant that this really did feel like an alternative to alcohol. Having finished my first bottle pretty fast, I'll definitely be a repeat customer.
Delicious flavours, a delightful taste experience!
good communication, excellent packaging, speedy service. and tha's before i try the product!

Just so delicious ! My order arrived super quickly and so well presented. Beautiful bottle and booklet with lots of recipe ideas of how to serve it. We absolutely adore it. I can't recommend it enough.
Everyone‚Äôs tastebuds are different !This one is not for me ! Nice bottle ! Good packaging! Sadly the taste was not to my liking !
IGNORE TEXT
Excellent spirit!! Customer service was amazing.

Fantastic. I purchased the smaller bottle as a tester - with tonic, super fresh in flavour and much more than the 7pm alternative I was originally looking for. Great branding and came with a helpful little book of mixer ideas for 12 different drinks, which I am already looking forward to trying. Great work - I‚Äôll be back for more.

Such a life saver! I‚Äôve been looking for a sophisticated, delicious and not-too-sweet alcohol-free spirit for ages. Feragaia hits all the right notes, it‚Äôs complex, earthy and you can drink it slowly to savour the taste. I find other non-alcoholic drinks are just trying to be something they‚Äôre not and leave you dissatisfied; whereas Feragaia is strong and delicious enough to be its own unique spirit. I really look forward to an evening when I have a glass (or two :)) of Feragaia with tonic, bitters and some orange rind. It‚Äôs utter perfection - couldn‚Äôt recommend it highly enough. Thank you for making it!

review_title: First impressions. Received bottle well packaged with 2‚Ä¶
review_text: Received bottle well packaged with 2 soft drinks included to try.First impressions the smell to me is a like a mixture between brandy and whisky but the taste similar to gin depending on what you add. Quite liked the taste very different from what I usually drink. Tried it as doing dry January and had it with coke. Haven‚Äôt tried any other of the cocktails/mock tails  from the booklet they included but aim to do so at some point.

review_title: Very good idea to include the recipe‚Ä¶
review_text: Very good idea to include the recipe book which was well presented and useful

review_title: I was glad to have tried the small‚Ä¶
review_text: I was glad to have tried the small trial bottle first.  After all the build-up with your promotion I have to admit I was expecting a sensational drink, or at least something with a bit more ‚Äòpoke‚Äô. I found it thin & not very aromatic.  The taste wasn‚Äôt exciting & only the ginger beer made it a worthwhile drink. ( I haven‚Äôt got Covid!) I‚Äôm sorry to write negatively about something you‚Äôve obviously put a lot of money into; but you said you wanted an honest appraisal.

Beautifully packaged and cool image. Very expensive for a 50cl bottle. As a non drinker I thought I would give it a try. Yes it does taste nice, it isn't earch shattering though, reminds me of Purdeys.Would I buy again? At this price, no, I think the slick image and product packaging is what you pay for more than the drink.

review_title: Really enjoyed my first taste of‚Ä¶
review_text: Really enjoyed my first taste of Feragaia. Great flavours.
Delightful. Perfect with either tonic or ginger ale

Congratulations, guys, on setting up a  business in the Borders, particularly one that is innovative and linked to the culture of the place.  Feragaia is most unusual: non-alcoholic but distinctive.  It has a very clean taste, rather like bitters, but it's complex, difficult to analyse.  It lends itself to mixing with citrus and herbs like rosemary.  A friend says he has devised a cocktail with a base of green tea.  Looking forward to trying that and to more recipes, which Jamie tells me will appear on the website.

What an interesting drink! When we first tried the spirit neat both myself and my wife did not take to it straight away however we followed the advice to develop a taste for it and as a mixer with a small amount of lemonade (what we had in) it is a game changer! Like others who have left a review we could have given up on it in the early days and been disappointed but we are extremely happy we experimented with it and look forward to trying other cocktails!
Product beautifully presented. I quite like the drink - it is fresh and distinctive. It, for me, won‚Äôt replace whisky but does provide a great non-alcoholic alternative to alcohol
If you want to enjoy a cocktail but want to avoid too much alcohol then Feragaia is perfect. It tastes wonderful and comes with a booklet of cocktail suggestions.

review_title: Thanks Very Much and Happy New Year to‚Ä¶
review_text: Thanks Very Much and Happy New Year to All your Colleagues and Families Bill
Very tasty and different drink

review_title: I wanted to buy my boss an alcohol free‚Ä¶
review_text: I wanted to buy my boss an alcohol free drink that she hadn't tried. Thanks to your beautiful branding, I picked Feragaia and she was not disappointed! A complex and provocative drink that was really savoured. Service was fantastic and we have since recommended Feragaia to our alcohol free group members. Many thanks

Excellent marketing, presentation and well done on that. The product itself - well it's just not doing anything for me. I dont know what I was expecting but the aroma was redolent of homeopathic remedies that I occasionally take. I gave it a good go though. I tried all the suggested recipes in the excellent booklet but I could not get past my initial  impression of the product. To be honest i preferred the recipe combinations without the Feregaia added.

review_title: The service is great and the bottle‚Ä¶
review_text: The service is great and the bottle looks nice but I really don't like the taste. There are other non alcoholic spirits on the market which I much prefer so I'm afraid I won't be buying this again.

Feragaia, for me, is the opportunity to do things differently without compromising on the cherished aspects of tradition: achieved by the perfect blend of 14 botanicals ‚Äì so we're told. And I have no doubt about it as the taste is surprisingly rich and indulgingly tangy whilst being refreshing (citrus is quite distinct) and versatile (I loved it with ginger ale) at the same time. While alcohol-free drinks have always been too sweet for my taste or end up being disappointingly bland, Feragaia is not just an alternative you settle for but an after-work (or after breakfast, that's the fun of it...) pleasure in its own right. An alcohol-free spirit seems to be the rational and literally sober choice but the experience of Feragaia is actually far from sobering.Also the customer service was excellent. I made a mistake filling out the form and received immediate help. The package arrived plastic-free and in perfect condition.

Firstly delivery was exceptionally quick and I ordered in the week leading up to Christmas! Excellently packaged with two taster mixers. However, the absolute highlight is the product itself. Far superior in quality to any other brand we have tried including Seedlip etc. Absolutely delightful taste and excellent that there is a cocktail book that accompanies it to try different mixers. A really grown up non-alcoholic drink for those who would like a tipple or cocktail instead of the usual soft drinks. Cannot recommend highly enough. Will definitely be purchasing more!!

review_title: The product was delivered very quickly‚Ä¶
review_text: The product was delivered very quickly and my husband really likes the taste. Also the handy book of recipes was a great idea

Having seen it advertised with tonic water that was the first I tried, and I must admit it wasnt to my taste.  Dry ginger however was a game changer...  I love it.  For some reason having seen all the advertisements, I expected a drink with more body to it..,  something warming and comforting, and it doesnt fulfil on that score but its a lovely drink anyway...
Efficient delivery.  I think this is a required taste, quite strong aftertaste.  Please give it a try though - all depends on taste.

review_title: Great gin substitute. I love it!!
review_text: For anyone who likes gin or Campari but wants something without the alcohol then this is for you. I drink it like a g and t with tonic and a slice of Orange.It has a botanical with hint of citrus taste.I ordered it direct and it was dispatched promptly.I would recommend it
Received my order in super speedy time. I am still exploring this unique drink to find the ideal way to enjoy it!
Product is very good, can reccomend it to everyone.The customer service is first class, despite a shortage of staff due to the pandemic, they are quick to answer, polite and professional.

I don't drink spirits and I was curious to try Feragaia. I didn't like it drinking it straight, however, when I tried it mixed with ginger beer it turned into quite a nice drink. It's also nice mixed with lemonade. If I were to receive it as a present I would drink it but I don't think I will buy it again.
Cheeky little drink with just a touch of burn to give it the desired adult drink touch. Loving mine with ginger and lots of ice

review_title: Product was easy to order and delivered‚Ä¶
review_text: Product was easy to order and delivered promptly. Well wrapped, despite postman accidentally dropping it! Given as gifts, so haven't had any reviews yet.

Very disappointed. We have tried lots of the so called non alcoholic spirits and they are all disgusting, tasting somewhere in between dishwater and medicine. After reading the reviews for this one, we thought we'd give it a go as a treat for Christmas. It arrived in good time in a well presented box. We waited until Christmas day to try it and wish we hadn't bothered. It tastes like water with a hint of ginger. Complete waste of money. Just glad we only bought a small bottle.
This is delicious - a sophisticated blend of flavours, similar in character to a scotch whisky.  An excellent choice for those who want a ‚Äògrown-up‚Äô non-alcoholic drink.
IGNORE TEXT
Definitely the most interesting alcoholic free drink I have tasted. Absolutely delicious.
A very speedy delivery. Well packaged. Excellent service. Very refreshing taste with tonic.
Very efficient delivery. And great drink!

review_title: Grown up drink which packs a punch
review_text: The initial aroma is like the sea... Think seaweed and ozone. Served over ice, it is reminiscent of your first taste of spirits, with a complex flavour and a slight burn. To be savoured slowly once the kids are in bed. Will buy again.
Great service, lovely to drink!
Excellent! I'll buy this again. Where have you been hiding it?
Great service. Great product.

First-ever purchase of an AF spirit. Pleasantly surprised by the dry taste, flavour and drinkability and appreciated the inclusion of complementary tonic and ginger ale. Delicious simply with tonic and an orange twist and great to have something classy in a glass to hand out to those refraining from alcohol.

review_title: Finally, a dry non-alcohol drink with an adult flavour
review_text: I've been looking for a drink like this for a long time. I've tried a few recent non-alcohol spirits, such as Seedlip and I find them either plain horrible, or too sweet. They are also usually pointless - you may as well just drink the mixer on its own. But Feragaia is way better. It is an acquired taste - my first sniff and taste were not very favourable. I tried it with tonic - yes a bit better, then with ginger ale as recommended, but this is too sweet for me. So I persevered as a purist, topping it up with a little sparkling water and a slice of orange or lemon. So no added sweetness or calories or chemicals... After maybe 3 or 4, over a few days, I found myself really enjoying the (very adult) flavour. I usually drink San Pellegrino if I can, when avoiding alcohol, but Feragaia has given me a reason to sometimes choose a change of flavour. And I should add that the service is excellent, with speedy delivery - I congratulate Jamie, the founder, on persevering with what cannot have been an easy development. I am looking forward to experimenting with other ways of enjoying it.

review_title: This was for a Christmas gift so not‚Ä¶
review_text: This was for a Christmas gift so not yet tasted it. However the service and delivery speed were amazing. Beautiful packaging too.
Scotland's finest. I love it!
All very good
Great service, great product. Arrived quickly, nicely packed.

review_title: Very good service and lovely drink
review_text: IGNORE TEXT
Quick and efficient service. A slight delay on delivery, but understandable at Christmas time.
Worse than mouthwash. Ugh!

review_title: Very helpful and quick to reply üëç
review_text: IGNORE TEXT
Just tasted my first Feragaia with Fevertree clementine and cinammon. Delicious. Looking forward to trying  with different mixers.Would definitely purchase again. First class customer service.

review_title: Very impressed with the product for the‚Ä¶
review_text: Very impressed with the product for the price and prompt delivery too! Haven‚Äôt sampled it as it‚Äôs purchased as a gift.

Absolutely delicious with ginger ale. I was a little disappointed that something that says spirit didn't give you a partial alcoholic taste. I also Adnams ghost ship 0.5% low alcohol beer which tastes exactly like the alcoholic version.

review_title: Not to be drunk neat lovely with tonic‚Ä¶
review_text: Not to be drunk neat lovely with tonic .fast delivery

Easy to order and prompt delivery of Christmas gifts for my tea-total friends and relatives. As promised received the Cocktail book after main delivery (rerun at the publishers). Look forward to tasting Feragaia.Thanks and all the best for 2021 to Jamie and the team.
Excellent service, great communication. The drink has a lovely taste packs a punch, I enjoyed it as a hot toddy and on the rocks. A great slow sipper to enjoy on a chilly winter evening. Thank you

review_title: Your product was very good at the affa‚Ä¶
review_text: Your product was very good at the affa fine market in Aberdeen so upon trying it I purchased a 50 cl bottle and tried it with coco cola it was good so I gave a wee dram to my mums friend and she loved it also so I bought her a 25cl bottle as a Christmas gift over all the delivery was despatched on the Thursday and we recieved it on the sat as I work for the post office
A fabulous drink - strong, bold herbaceous taste. Feragaia is a wonderful present for those that want to try something different. I love everything about this brand!

review_title: Very quick and easy to order
review_text: Very quick and easy to order, and a message via email to check all was ok.

review_title: Ordering and delivery were a smooth   I‚Ä¶
review_text: Ordering and delivery were a smooth   I brought it as a gift. So I am yet to try the product and give my opinion. Yet it sounds delicious and I was given a twenty % off next order.

Wow! Wonderful customer service. Very pleasant experience. I haven't tasted yet as it is a gift for a friend but am really impressed with the quality and presentation of the package. It looks really expensive and yet so reasonably priced.
IGNORE TEXT

review_title: Sampled Feragaia for the first time on‚Ä¶
review_text: Sampled Feragaia for the first time on board Fingal in Edinburgh . Staff talked knowledgably about how it could be served -absolutely delicious.Service direct from Feragaia excellent and personal.

I bought the Feragaia Pioneer Pack as a Christmas gift for someone else so can't vouch for the taste yet, but can say that it is very nicely presented and arrived well packaged. I had an email to say the cocktail booklet was currently out of stock but could be sent as soon as it was available if required. The booklet arrived the day after the bottle so altogether a good experience with excellent communication.

Fantastic drink, fir anyine that doesn't fancy a proper drink in the evening or like me soba for 4 years this will take the edge of, customer services was fantastic cant fault them for anything would recommend this to anyoneThank you to the company

review_title: Great nonalcoholic liqueur, better customer service
review_text: One the best nonalcoholic liqueurs I've tried, and low sugar which is a nice bonus. Their customer service was quite good and preemptively emailed me to let me know that there was a tiny issue.
Gorgeous product, promptly delivered with how to make cocktail book followed up by thank you email from company director... 5* service!

review_title: Only commenting on the service as this‚Ä¶
review_text: Only commenting on the service as this is a Christmas Present. Beautifully presented, quick attentive service. Communication with the owner was amazing. So helpful and kind. Can't wait for Christmas day and will review on taste then
I can only comment on the service, as the product is a Christmas present and has yet to be tried. Nice looking bottle in a smart box. Very friendly and attentive service.

review_title: Feragaia.  Ordering and delivery was trouble free
review_text: Ordering and delivery was trouble free. Is A Xmas present so can‚Äôt review the actual Product itself

review_title: Not a pale imitation of an alcoholic drink but a unique experience
review_text: Delicious especially with Pink Peppercorn tonic water. Has a smoky spicy and very different taste. As such is not a pale imitation of an alcoholic drink but a unique experience. Have really enjoyed as a wind down in the evening
Extremely impressed with the complexity and  flavor of Feragaia. Love it with Ginger Ale and a splash of lime; delicious. I will be a life long customer!

review_title: Really enjoying Feragaia as an alcohol‚Ä¶
review_text: Really enjoying Feragaia as an alcohol free alternative to G&T. Distinctive taste and aroma makes it feel like a special treat.S
Very fast delivery.  Can't comment on the item as it's a present for someone!

review_title: For days when you don‚Äôt want a G&T
review_text: I certain Christmassy someone showcased Feragaia on her Christmas craft tv show. Sometimes I‚Äôm not in the mood for alcohol and my husband isn‚Äôt a big drinker so it‚Äôs good to have a selection of non-alcoholic alternatives. Feragaia caught my eye because it‚Äôs zero sugar with very low carb content so great for my husband who is a diabetic.It‚Äôs delicious just with soda water or spice it up with ginger ale. Yum!!Deliveries were quick - yes, deliveries!! The first bottle was tested quickly so subsequent orders have been placed. The single bottle order comes with a couple of mixers to blend and a little cocktail recipe booklet. It‚Äôs packaged very smartly and safely. Communication from the team throughout has been great and the website has lots of information about how the spirit is made and lots of recipes to try. Great to be supporting a young British company. Cheers!

review_title: It's so good I had to double check it was alcohol free.
review_text: Wasn't expecting much from this product but i'm blown away by just how sophisticated it is. There are several layers to its flavour and it's interesting on the nose too. I tried it over ice first and savoured its complexity before deciding on what mixer would do it justice. Curled up on the Sofa with a cosy blanket, this genuinely hit the spot. A real aaah moment which I wasn't expecting.  I actually got up and checked the bottle in case it contained alcohol. It doesn't. Not sure how you did it Feragaia but i'm delighted you did.
Bought as a Christmas present and am sure it will be well received. Lovely presentation box. Well packaged and quickly sent.

review_title: Delicious drink whether you drink alcohol or not
review_text: Bought for my sister and her boyfriend who don't drink. Lovely packaging, super fast delivery and tastes great! Even came with a delicious cocktail menu for how to enjoy it - delicious! Thank you for creating an alternative for those who don't drink alcohol - which is also good enough to drink for those that do!
Excellent service, arrived quickly and really nice to drink. Would highly recommend.
Quick service no problems, received 2 free mixers too.
Easy to use website, fast delivery and very well presented for Christmas gifts.

review_title: Unfortunately this isn‚Äôt to my taste
review_text: Unfortunately this isn‚Äôt to my taste, I think it will be fantastic for someone who likes the taste. A wee dram of alcohol free spirt with an acquired taste. Pleased I tried it, shame I didn‚Äôt enjoy it. However I wish you all the best for the future.

Order delivered on time, and very pleased with the service. Sadly, the product is not to my taste.I tried it neat and with a mixer, but in neither case does the product really stand out the way that any single malt or blended whisky does. The aromas are far too subtle, and the flavour profile just doesn't match what I expected.It is interesting, but I'm going to continue looking for something else.
IGNORE TEXT
Sophisticated. Stylish. Satisfying.Superb product and speedy delivery.
Prompt dispatch with free mixers, look forward to trying it out on Xmas day

Package contained Feragaia plus 2x fever tree mixers. Unfortunately one of the fever trees leaked during transit damaging the package and the flyer describing recommended cocktails. Thankfully label on Feragaia was fine once it dried off but as it was purchased as a gift it did rather spoil things.Some tissue paper or padding of some sort would avoid this recurring.

review_title: We try it last night with out a‚Ä¶
review_text: We try it last night with out a mix.next time we will put a mix with it.So glad my husband can have a drink ,for with the tablet s he is in can't have drink with alcoholic in it. Hope you will do more.many thanks Marilyn.

review_title: I doubt I will buy again
review_text: My daughter quite liked it but I found it quite astringent and an overwhelming taste of rosemary which I find a herb used sparingly. I doubt I will buy more. I found it a little unsubtle.
Very happy with the service - my feragaia came very quickly, was securely packaged and came with two free bottles of tonic - bonus!

review_title: Not to my taste I'm afraid
review_text: Not to my taste I'm afraid. Couldn't help but compare it to drinking medicine no matter what I added to it. My husband who loves a single malt, drank it and said it was ok. Nicely packaged however and swiftly delivered.
Just bought a bottle of Feragaia and tried tonight for the first time. Wow it is amazing! Perfect alternative to alcohol. Absolutely delighted with my purchase. Thanks!

It looks stunning. I even love the box and the lovely 2 mixers to go with it. The only comment both I and my lovely postman Gordon would say is.. pop a little bit of tissue or bubble wrap just to stop the bottles wobbling and clanging. Gordon even waited whilst I opened it to see if the bottles had smashed or not as there was so much clanging! They hadn't which was a relief and I can't wait to give it to my friend as it is the perfect gift. Thank you.
Loved the packaging, very attractive and inviting. However, it has a very unusual taste, which doesn't immediately grab me. I'm hoping it might grow on me

I already submitted a review for Feragaia. I tried it with Cloudy apple juice. I tried it with a Tonic water, I have decided I like it neat .There are such interesting tastes that tickle the taste buds.

review_title: Not bad at all for non alcoholic‚Ä¶
review_text: Not bad at all for non alcoholic spirit. We both enjoyed it with tonic as an aperitif.
Great taste for all those people who are sick of sickly sweet drinks. Grown up taste. Great with ginger ale ,soda water or aromatic tonic. Definitely be buying more
Quick delivery and parcel well presented with no plastic. This is a gift so cant comment on taste but I would buy again.
With me earlier than expected. Christmas pressie so not tried it yet
My second delivery from Feragaia. Arrived promptly and well packaged. Looking forward to enjoying Feragaia over Christmas
The package arrived fast. More than we expected.

Not bad.  A much milder flavour than Three Spirits.   Tried it neat with ice.  Slightly smoky with hints of citrus.  Certainly very drinkable, but falls short of being great.  Perhaps a bit too mild for my taste; it is certainly worth trying.  I will be trying the other flavours to see if they match my tastes.

review_title: I wanted to give something to my son‚Ä¶
review_text: I wanted to give something to my son who says he has everything  So I gave him nothing lol no alcohol Awaiting his verdict Will tell you when he tells me   Beautiful bottle  thank you
Delicious. Such an efficient service too
Excellent quality bottle and presentation packaging and lovely cocktail suggestions, a unique taste well worth a try
Excellent service . Great unique product.
Bought as gift. arrived speedily and looks great.
Delicious non alcoholic alternative Great delivery service
Excellent service ! An interesting brew that lightens the spirit !

It may be to some people's taste but not mine. Purchased the 250ml bottle in the gift pack. Tried it neat and with tonic as suggested and just not a taste I could get used to. Strange aroma as well.I like the idea of non alcoholic botanicals but sadly have yet to find one I would want to have a second glass of. All are very expensive so will not be trying any more. Will stick to gin and if I want non alcoholic; the Fevertree mixers tick all the boxes.UPDATEFeragia have picked up on this review and have kindly made various suggestions which I have tried including taking with Ginger Ale, but the base taste is still very strong and is not something that suits my palate or can be disguised. Do however try it for yourselves. Taste is a very personal thing.  .

review_title: Not my kind of taste updated
review_text: I'm sorry I just didn't like the taste of this drink. I tried it neat over ice, and then with the ginger beer mixer that came with it. Just not my taste, I'm afraid.Edit: Jamie from the company contacted me and suggested cocktails I might make, but also offered me 33% of the cost as a refund, as it was not to my taste. Great customer service

review_title: My favourite non alcoholic drink so far
review_text: My order arrived promptly with 2 mixer bottles unexpectedly included, and recipe ideas, a nice touch. It‚Äôs always a risk buying a new product but I have to say this is the nicest drink I‚Äôve bought so far, love it mixed with ginger ale,  I‚Äôd definitely recommend
Very nice, very quick delivery. Simply perfect.  Thank you

review_title: Delivery was quick and the bottle was‚Ä¶
review_text: Delivery was quick and the bottle was well packaged. As for the contents: it definitely tastes much better with a mixer. The taste is unusual and distinctive but grows on you, and I would certainly buy it again.

review_title: Purchased as a gift so not tasted yet‚Ä¶
review_text: Purchased as a gift so not tasted yet but it looks good. The parcel rattled as the two bottles of tonic, included (nice surprise) had no packaging. We have the Gin Club delivery,  now there is someone that knows how to package.   It might be a good idea to offer this on monthly direct debit.  At a special price And include goodies tonic/crisps.   We are purchasing our daughter  the Gin Club package for 12 months, as part of her 40th birthday present.  She really looks forward to it each month.  Why not market this in the same way. Regards, Iris.
Great service with the complimentary mixers and quick delivery! Love enjoying Feragaia with soda and lime - amazing taste - will definitely be ordering another bottle.

review_title: I was really looking forward to trying‚Ä¶
review_text: I was really looking forward to trying this but I was very disappointed. The flavours were all there but they tasted very raw, it was as if the ingredients had been grated up steeped in water then strained and bottled. There was none of the mellowness that an alcoholic drink has. I realise that I could put it with a mixer but if I don‚Äôt like the taste near I‚Äôm not going to waste a mixer on it! Sorry but you‚Äôve got a long way to go before I buy this again!

review_title: I was excited to try this and set high
review_text: I was excited to try this and set high, perhaps too high expectations on it.  I was craving scotch and this isn't scotch and can't be.   However I've grown into it.  I mix it with tonic, ginger and apple juice and its tasty.  I'll order more for when I want something different.  It'll be part of my sober future.

review_title: Really enjoying my Feragaia with plenty‚Ä¶
review_text: Really enjoying my Feragaia with plenty of ice, fresh lime juice, peel and soda. A delicious long drink.
Wasn't sure what to expect but am definitely not disappointed. Absolutely not like whisky but works very well with ginger ale for a warming, non-alcoholic drink.
Love this drink. I now order it by the case! Great taste - love it with tonic - very efficient delivery, it‚Äôs my go-to non-alcholic evening drink.

Great product great service. Ordered direct and delivered on time. We stocked up because having tried Feragaia a few times we know just how delicious it is! Strongly recommended as a genuinely tasty alcohol free option!

review_title: What a great find this is
review_text: What a great find this is! I can‚Äôt drink alcohol so it is so encouraging to find a really tasty alternative that looks like a proper grown up drink! I like the ginger ale and mint mix but am still experimenting wildly! A true gem! Celia
Super tasty product!We mixed it with bosco tea (= apple tea), honey and ginger, the result is a super tasty drink!

review_title: Not as aromatic as I was expecting,very‚Ä¶
review_text: Not as aromatic as I was expecting,very subtle taste.  I think it gets lost in strong tasting mixers.
Love this absolutely gorgeous very different drink may be gorgeous is the wrong word, taste so different but weirdly good. I love it.
Beautiful packaging, but lacked body and flavour. No warming aftertaste. Reminded me of a weak medicine. Slightly enhanced with your lovely ginger ale. Sorry.

Gorgeous product - really refreshing to drink. We enjoyed it with Ginger Ale & a twist of Lime over Ice. Loved the complimentary Tonics & Cocktail booklet. Have happily recommended to friends & family!

Such a pleasure to be able to savour a completely alcohol free, made in Scotland tipple.  It came quickly and included two complementary mixers and a very helpful and imaginative alcohol free recipe cards for mocktails. I truly hope this is a successful venture for you. Well done !Joanne Atkinson
Bought as a present... arrived quickly with a nice pair of mixers and a wee guide with ideas for mocktails... I'm told it tasted great
Great delivery times, easy to use website.Fantastic product.Keep it up.
Lovely adult alcohol free drink - great with ginger ale. Thank you for the extra tonic and ginger ale!
lovely to drink with fever tree ginger ale and Ice  made Sober October almost manageablerecommended   especially for the festive period and nominated drivers
Very efficient, quick delivery. Also received a couple of mixers, free. Very kind. I bought this as a gift, so don't know what it tastes like yet.
Quick delivery and nice innovative spirit

This sounded like a lovely product and it came well packaged and presented. I‚Äôm sure that if you like it you love it but it is so not my taste.The seller contacted me after reading my review to offer ideas about different cocktails which was kind of them. Taste is a very subjective thing and I don‚Äôt want to put you off... you might love it.

review_title: Love the drink, the story and the people behind it
review_text: As a non-drinker but fascinated with mixology, I've been struggling to find an alcohol-free spirit that is also based where I'm living in Scotland. Then I started to learn more about Feragaia and was hooked into the story and the taste profile.After ordering, there minor issues with the delivery (not their fault at all), but it was handled really well and the support I got from the guys were fantastic. It's good to get that personal touch with a company.And after recreating different recipes, I can see why people are not convinced about the flavours. It is unusual at first. But it's like cooking; you just find a recipe that works for you and I've got several in my locker that I enjoy.I'm excited to see what else Feragaia has in store in the future.
Excellent service, product and price.

review_title: Wonderful quick service and the product‚Ä¶
review_text: Wonderful quick service and the product is very interesting too!

My review is so far based on the introduction to the product by Bill, during the Orkney International Science Festival and Foraging Fortnight, on the website, on the delivery, on the packaging (especially the branded tissue paper - genius!), the recipes, the other documentation, and the effect of all that (very positive) on the person I gave it to as an early Christmas present. Was really nice to receive a couple of complimentary mixers - a new brand on me, and they will galvanise our mixology experiments. Final brillian touch was the "Feragile" (Fragile, geddit?) sticker on the outer packaging.Very much looking forward to sampling the product, when the gift-receiver decides to open it! May delay a few weeks, so that the 2-month "best before, after opening" date includes at least Christmas. Then again, we might get so enthusiastic we need another bottle by then!Will update this review, or create a new one with tasting notes, and reactions to the actual contents of the so-far unopened bottle!

review_title: Have not yet drank any but I felt that‚Ä¶
review_text: Have not yet drank any but I felt that the packaging could have been more robust. The bottle wasn‚Äôt damaged but the outer box was pushed in a little more packing inside the outer box would be a good idea.

I really wanted to like it because I like the idea of a non-alcoholic spirit to enjoy when being the designated driver, and I enjoy some non-alcoholic gins. However, I really just don't like it. I've tried a few times, and I've tried to give it to a few friends/family members, and likewise they've had similar opinions. It's been good fun trying it, and has provided some enjoyment in doing so, including having it a surprise in a whisky tasting, but friends/family have all felt similarly. I've also tried the gorse cocktail. Hopefully a second iteration may come through. As a business it's professional and well run; the bottle was well packaged, postage was pretty prompt and communication was good. When it was apparent that our taste experience hadn't been as they'd hoped, Jamie was also good at communicating to see what he could do to help.

review_text: Ordered Feragaia online and it arrived, beautifully packaged just when they said it would. Additional surprise in that a free bottle of tonic and ginger ale were included without my knowing, thank you Feragaia! Looking forward to sharing it with friends very soon!
Delicious, definitely recommend and quick delivery!

However, i am updating this review as i received a full refund from the company and a most exemplary service. In addition, my husband tried the product and this is his comment;" Top notes of ginger followed by citrus and a wide range of herbal undertones " I am happy to report he found it quite pleasant although since he also dislikes ginger would not choose to purchase more. He would give the product four stars for interest and quality and I've added the extra star for excellent customer service. I hope to purchase a different product one day.

review_title: By far the best alcohol free spirit I have ever had
review_text: This is is life changing drink, incredibly complex with a clean taste. I can highly recommend it!!!

I honestly love Feragaia - this product is so much better than any other non-alcholic spirits. It's got such a nice taste, my favourite being with tonic over ice. Couldn't recommend this brand more, clearly take their values seriously and it's epic to get out and about early doors without a hangover after socialising with friends.

review_title: Distinguished taste and wonderful customer service
review_text: Not only does Feragaia taste delightful, but the company is wonderful. Every order I've placed has been delivered within days in sleek yet eco-friendly packaging and comes with a cocktail recipe card to help you enjoy the drink to its fullest potential. Also, it's wonderful to support local UK businesses and the Fife-born founders have found a way to apply the centuries-old Scottish distilling expertise to create a refined, non-alcoholic spirit option.Feragaia  is delicious on its own for those days that you want to enjoy a cocktail but without the negative affects of consuming alcohol. It's a sophisticated drink that is refreshing and not too sweet, and is a great alternative for those that are not drinking alcohol for whatever reasons. You can sip and enjoy Feragaia like you would a fine whiskey, or mix it with tonic or soda to create a delicious and energising spritzer.For those evenings that you are trying to rev up your normal cocktail, Feragaia can add a new twist (with an orange slice, of course) to your classic G&T. Once I started drinking these, it's been very difficult to return to a normal G&T. This amber Fife gold is definitely worth a try! 5/5 - would (and have) recommend(ed) to a friend.

review_title: This is an amazingly good drink
review_text: This is an amazingly good drink, sophisticated and delicious when mixed with either tonic, ginger beer or as a cocktail - and there are some great cocktail suggestions on the website.
IGNORE TEXT

review_title: refreshing and sophisticated addition to AF choices
review_text: Great customer service with a super quick response time to my order. Fresh tasting, distinctively Scottish botanical flavourings.  Light, refreshing and fairly sophisticated.  One of my tow current favourite AF tipples.

review_title: I did not receive my paid for Feragaia!
review_text: I did in fact receive the Feragaia, but the PO had delivered it, and safely and helpfully popped it into an outhouse, that we don‚Äôt use very often! Most impressive personal service.Thank you for your care and your  exceptional product, which I am currently enjoying with a pink grapefruit mixer on ice!Michelle.

review_title: I ordered a second bottle as soon as I‚Ä¶
review_text: I ordered a second bottle as soon as I was finishing the first. It has a lovely strong scent and rounded taste in the mouth that can take all kinds of mixer. I like to mix it with ginger from cordial or ginger ale. Will definitely be buying again.

I am sorry but I think ¬´very different¬ª is the best description I can give. Nothing like anything I have tasted before. I see other people like it, so I guess I am the problem not the drink... review_title: A sheep in wolf's clothing... Beware!
review_text: Whilst the flavour is certainly unique, the product is definitely not value for money. Distilled multiple times with botanicals used like in gins etc is all fine and well, but ultimately it is just flavoured water. And for ¬£28, that's money for old rope. You're certainly not going to alleviate an alcoholic's craving with this. Good effort but ultimately pointless bar the marketing factor.I did, however, receive a 50% refund following my review given I was not able to sample the product in advance of purchase so customer service is to be commended.

review_title: Nice holiday, shame about the agency. And the price.
review_text: While the flight, the hotel and the transfer were all fine - excellent, even - the booking process was NOT.Advertised at ¬£304 full board per person, all inclusive, this escalated by very nearly 50% by the time the booking was confirmed. Imagine my anger, therefore, when 20 minutes after responding to the confirmation email, the firm rang back to say that the holiday was not available unless we came home a day earlier, at INCREASED cost.After some discussion, the date stayed, but the package was cut to bed and breakfast only at the hotel. As the hotel was quite happy to upgrade us (at extra cost), this was clearly a financial manoeuvre on hte part of Galaxy. Sharp practice? I think so, and I won't be returning to the firm, though I will be using Jet2, and the Beatriz Costa again, very happily.

Still waiting on this as apparently they are waiting on a refund from the supplier. Even though we paid Galaxy holidays and not the supplier!! Galaxy holidays have removed this hotel from their website but still no refund!! The customer service is disgraceful to say the least. Where is my refund!!

review_title: Con company do not use Absolutely disgusted by this company am‚Ä¶
review_text: Absolutely disgusted by this company am now on a bus back to Dundee. Original booking booked for me and daughter wanted to change name to son. They said i had to do online verification with ryanair which due to them supplying ryanair with wrong info could not do and then said i had ran out of attempts online. Galaxy advised me to change at airport. And as i had not done online verifications it was my problem Arrived at airport  at 2am waited in cold for 1 hour went to check in desk and was advised that i could not change name as it was only check in and when asked if they could help they checked passport's and it was not even my daughters name on original booking so even if i did not want to change name we could not have gone. Well done Galaxy holidays for ruining our holiday!!!

Absolutely horrible, my experience with galaxy holidays has been horrific and I haven‚Äôt even got there yet. From the start I tried to book a specific hotel. It was all fine for months until I tried to call them to extend the holiday where I go told I couldn‚Äôt stay in the hotel I wanted to and that it had been like this for months yet no one told me. They then proceeded to say it happens sometimes and I agreed to it possibly happening. Then gave me worse hotel options than the one I was originally meant to stay at. Then I had to pay extra to stay at another hotel. They give you a quote on holidays but then add on all these extra prices and before you know it you holiday is 2x the price than the original quote. They are all rude. Not happy and won‚Äôt be going with them again.

I booked a holiday with Galaxy Hols to Lanzarote to celebrate my partner's 70th birthday.All was well until I amended holiday and needed new transfer voucher posted to me at  the cost of ¬£25. After numerous phone calls an e mails I was beginning to panic as it was the week we were travelling before we received transfer vouchers.We had not received boarding passes  by the 30th of September and we were travelling a.m.on the 2nd October. I rang Galaxy Hols again on the 30th and was lucky to speak to Daniel Smith who took the whole matter in hand and emailed the boarding passes.He was courteous, polite and very efficient. He even promised to email homeward boarding passes for the return journey.Thank you Dan excellent service.ELAINE Quinlan.boarding passes

This agency is not serious at all, it is a real BIG LIE, they let me down in a critical situation, me, my wife and my baby. Stolen my money.  I booked a Holidays with them to Salou, they were very quick to take the payment certainly. No problem, I was so happy with their speech thinking I found a serious agency that I could trust. Arriving to Salou, everything was ok. I said: Ah, finally the negative comments I have read about them were wrong The last day to come back to England, surprise.  After two hours waiting for the coach to go to the Airport, a named DAN from the Agency called me, informed me that unfortunately Raynair was on Strike, asking me to book MYSELF a return flight for two days later. Reassuring me that they will REFUND ME the hotel room for two more nights. I found this strange that DAN asked me to do it myself as it s the Agency responsibility to do it. I insisted with him on the phone, but again, he didn‚Äôt stop reassuring me, repeating that they will refund me every penny I paid. It was horrible to find an available hotel room, was disappointed, stressed but I need a room ASAP for my baby. I spent all the time searching for a return flight. When I came back to England, the nightmare started. I spent two months talking with different persons from the Agency, I emailed them all the proofs, the hotel room invoice, the flight tickets but they were repeating the same sentence: We are treating your case. Finally, the most courageous of their member team told me that they were not going to refund me the hotel stay just the flight when Raynair decides to refund them. I told her that DAN and JORDAN promised me to refund everything. She simply responded:  You have no written proof about it. Which means DAN was just lying and my money stolen. I am so disappointed and disgusted about their behavior, disrespect and lies. These holidays costed me a lot of money and two days not paid at work.
